clCustomerStatus.dbName: CASE CL.IS_ACTIVE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END

clCustomerType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=CL.CUSTOMER_TYPE)

clCustomerParent.dbName: (SELECT CASE CLT.CUSTOMER_TYPE WHEN 11109 THEN CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME ELSE CLT.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME + ' ' + CLT.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME + ' ' + CLT.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME END + ' (' + CLT.CUSTOMER_CODE + ')' FROM CLT_CUSTOMER_LIST CLT WHERE CLT.CUSTOMER_ID=CL.CUSTOMER_PARENT)

clCustomerTitle.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=CL.PREFIX)

clCustomerName.dbName: CASE CL.CUSTOMER_TYPE WHEN 11109 THEN CL.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME ELSE CL.CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME + ' ' + CL.CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME + ' ' + CL.CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME END

clCustomerMartStatus.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = 'MARST' AND MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=CL.MARITAL_STATUS)

clCustomerGender.dbName: CASE CL.GENDER WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END

clCustomerCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=CL.CUSTOMER_COUNTRY)

clCustomerState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=CL.CUSTOMER_COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=CL.CUSTOMER_STATE)

clCustomerMobile.dbName: CASE WHEN CL.CUSTOMER_TYPE = 11110 THEN ISNULL(CL.PER_CUST_MOBILE,'') ELSE ISNULL(CL.CUSTOMER_MOBILE,'') END

clAgencyNameDecPage.dbName: CASE AL.AGENCYNAME WHEN '0' THEN 'Agency Name' WHEN '1' THEN 'DBA Name' ELSE '' END

clAgencyAccountType.dbName: CASE AL.ACCOUNT_TYPE WHEN '101' THEN 'Saving' WHEN '100' THEN 'Checking' ELSE '' END

clAgencyBillType.dbName: CASE AL.AGENCY_BILL_TYPE WHEN '1' THEN 'Agency Bill' WHEN '0' THEN 'Direct Bill' ELSE '' END

clAgencyTerminationNotice.dbName: CASE AL.TERMINATION_NOTICE WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE '' END

clCustomerEmpApplOccu.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = '%OCC' AND MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=CL.APPLICANT_OCCU)

clCustomerEmpOccuDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN CL.DESC_APPLICANT_OCCU IS NULL OR CL.DESC_APPLICANT_OCCU = '' THEN '-N.A.-' ELSE CL.DESC_APPLICANT_OCCU END

clCustomerEmpCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=CL.EMPLOYER_COUNTRY)

clCustomerEmpState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=CL.EMPLOYER_COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=CL.EMPLOYER_STATE)

calCoAppStatus.dbName: CASE CAL.IS_ACTIVE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END

calCoAppPrimaryApp.dbName: CASE CAL.IS_PRIMARY_APPLICANT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

calCoAppTitle.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=CAL.TITLE)

calCoAppMartStatus.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = 'MARST' AND MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=CAL.CO_APPL_MARITAL_STATUS)

calCoAppCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.COUNTRY)

calCoAppState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=CAL.STATE)

calCoAppEmpAppliOccu.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = '%OCC' AND MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_OCCU)

calCoAppEmpCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_EMPL_COUNTRY)

calCoAppEmpState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_EMPL_COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_EMPL_STATE)

cnCustNoteType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=CN.NOTES_TYPE)

cnCustNoteAppNum.dbName: (SELECT AL.APP_NUMBER FROM APP_LIST AL WHERE AL.CUSTOMER_ID=CN.CUSTOMER_ID AND AL.APP_ID=CN.POLICY_ID AND AL.APP_VERSION_ID=CN.POLICY_VER_TRACKING_ID)

cnCustNoteClaim.dbName: (SELECT CI.CLAIM_NUMBER FROM CLM_CLAIM_INFO CI WHERE CI.CUSTOMER_ID=CN.CUSTOMER_ID AND CI.CLAIM_ID=CN.CLAIMS_ID)

cnCustNoteModiBy.dbName: (SELECT UL.USER_FNAME+ ' ' +UL.USER_LNAME FROM MNT_USER_LIST UL WHERE UL.USER_ID=CN.CREATED_BY)

pciPrPolCategory.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=PCI.POLICY_CATEGORY)

pciPrPolLOB.dbName: (SELECT LM.LOB_DESC FROM MNT_LOB_MASTER LM WHERE LM.LOB_ID=PCI.LOB)

pciPrPolRiskNew.dbName: CASE RISK_NEW_AGENCY WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

pciPrPolAssignRisk.dbName: CASE PCI.ASSIGNEDRISKYN WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

pciPrPolPriorProd.dbName: (SELECT UL.USER_FNAME+ ' ' +UL.USER_LNAME FROM MNT_USER_LIST UL WHERE UL.USER_ID=PCI.PRIOR_PRODUCER_INFO_ID)

pliPrLossLOB.dbName: (SELECT LM.LOB_DESC FROM MNT_LOB_MASTER LM WHERE LM.LOB_ID=PLI.LOB)

pliPrLossType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=PLI.LOSS_TYPE)

pliPrLossClmStatus.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=PLI.CLAIM_STATUS)

alAppState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=AL.COUNTRY_ID AND CSL.STATE_ID=AL.STATE_ID)

alAppLOB.dbName: (SELECT LM.LOB_DESC FROM MNT_LOB_MASTER LM WHERE LM.LOB_ID=AL.APP_LOB)

alAppSubLOB.dbName: (SELECT SLM.SUB_LOB_DESC FROM MNT_SUB_LOB_MASTER SLM WHERE SLM.LOB_ID=AL.APP_LOB AND SLM.SUB_LOB_ID=AL.APP_SUBLOB)

alAppTermMonths.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER LM ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID = LM.MAPPING_LOOKUP_ID WHERE LM.LOB_ID=AL.APP_LOB AND MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=AL.APP_TERMS)

alAppAgencyNameDecPage.dbName: CASE AL.AGENCYNAME WHEN '0' THEN 'Agency Name' WHEN '1' THEN 'DBA Name' ELSE '' END

alAppAgencyAccountType.dbName: CASE AL.ACCOUNT_TYPE WHEN '101' THEN 'Saving' WHEN '100' THEN 'Checking' ELSE '' END

alAppAgencyBillType.dbName: CASE AL.AGENCY_BILL_TYPE WHEN '1' THEN 'Agency Bill' WHEN '0' THEN 'Direct Bill' ELSE '' END

alAppAgencyTerminationNotice.dbName: CASE AL.TERMINATION_NOTICE WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE '' END

alAppCSRProd.dbName: (SELECT UL.USER_FNAME+ ' ' +UL.USER_LNAME FROM MNT_USER_LIST UL WHERE UL.USER_ID=AL.CSR)

alAppBillType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = 'BLCODE' AND MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=AL.BILL_TYPE)

alAppUnderwriter.dbName: ISNULL((SELECT UL.USER_FNAME+ ' ' +UL.USER_LNAME FROM MNT_USER_LIST UL WHERE UL.USER_ID=AL.UNDERWRITER),'To be Assigned')

alAppBillPlan.dbName: (SELECT IPD.PLAN_DESCRIPTION FROM ACT_INSTALL_PLAN_DETAIL IPD WHERE IPD.IDEN_PLAN_ID=AL.INSTALL_PLAN_ID)

alAppPicOfLoc.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=AL.PIC_OF_LOC)

alAppPrevAddress.DisplayName: Previous Address if less than 3 years(Max 250 characters)

appCoAppDetails.Table: CLT_APPLICANT_LIST CAL INNER JOIN APP_APPLICANT_LIST AAL ON AAL.CUSTOMER_ID=CAL.CUSTOMER_ID AND AAL.APPLICANT_ID=CAL.APPLICANT_ID
appCoAppDetails.Where: AAL.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AAL.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AAL.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AAL.APPLICANT_ID = @applicant_Id

aalAppCoAppStatus.dbName: CASE CAL.IS_ACTIVE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END

aalAppCoAppPrimaryApp.dbName: CASE CAL.IS_PRIMARY_APPLICANT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

aalAppCoAppTitle.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=CAL.TITLE)

aalAppCoAppMartStatus.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = 'MARST' AND MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=CAL.CO_APPL_MARITAL_STATUS)

aalAppCoAppCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.COUNTRY)

aalAppCoAppState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=CAL.STATE)

aalAppCoAppEmpAppliOccu.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = '%OCC' AND MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_OCCU)

aalAppCoAppEmpCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_EMPL_COUNTRY)

aalAppCoAppEmpState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_EMPL_COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_EMPL_STATE)

appAGIVehSolOwn.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_NON_OWNED_VEH WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appAGICarModified.dbName: CASE AGI.CAR_MODIFIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGICarModified.DisplayName: Has any car been modified, assembled or kit vehicle or have special equipment? (include customized vans and pickups indicate cost)

appAGIExistDmg.dbName: CASE AGI.EXISTING_DMG WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGIExistDmg.DisplayName: Any existing damage to a vehicle?(Include damaged glass)

appAGIAnyCarSch.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_CAR_AT_SCH WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appAGIAutoInsu.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_OTH_AUTO_INSU WHEN '1' THEN 'Yes' WHEN '0' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGIAutoInsu.DisplayName: Any other auto insurance in household?

appAGIVehOutState.dbName: CASE AGI.H_MEM_IN_MILITARY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGIVehOutState.DisplayName: Any household member using vehicle out of State over 6 months a year?

appAGILicSusRevk.dbName: CASE AGI.DRIVER_SUS_REVOKED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGILicSusRevk.DisplayName: Any drivers license been Suspended, restricted or revoked?

appAGIPhyImprd.dbName: CASE AGI.PHY_MENTL_CHALLENGED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGIPhyImprd.DisplayName: Any driver physically or mentally impaired?

appAGIFinRespFil.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_FINANCIAL_RESPONSIBILITY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGIFinRespFil.DisplayName: Any financial responsibility filing?(Give driver number and date of filing)

appAGIDtFilling.DisplayName: Driver Number And Date Of Filing

appAGIInsTrfrAgency.dbName: CASE AGI.INS_AGENCY_TRANSFER WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGIInsTrfrAgency.DisplayName: Has insurance been transferred within the agency?

appAGICovgDecl.dbName: CASE AGI.COVERAGE_DECLINED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGICovgDecl.DisplayName: Has any coverage been declined, cancelled (including for Non Payment) or non-renewed during the last 3 years?

appAGIAgentInsp.dbName: CASE AGI.AGENCY_VEH_INSPECTED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGIAgentInsp.DisplayName: Has the agent inspected the vehicle?

appAGILiveryRent.dbName: CASE AGI.USE_AS_TRANSPORT_FEE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGILiveryRent.DisplayName: Is any vehicle used for Livery, rental, passenger hire, or to transport persons to work for a fee?

appAGISalvageTitle.dbName: CASE AGI.SALVAGE_TITLE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appAGIAntiqueAuto.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_ANTIQUE_AUTO WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGIAntiqueAuto.DisplayName: Any vehicle considered an antique auto?

appAGIMultiPolicy.dbName: CASE AGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appAGIOwnRent.DisplayName: Current Residence is Owned or Rented?

appAGIDrvNotList.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_OTHER_THAN_INSURED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appAGIDrvNotList.DisplayName: Any other licensed drivers in the household that are not listed or rated on this policy

appAGIInsuElseWhere.dbName: CASE AGI.INSUREDELSEWHERE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appAGIOPriorLoss.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_PRIOR_LOSSES WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appAPVehicleInfo.Table: APP_VEHICLES AV LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AV.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AV.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND AV.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND AV.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appAPVehicleInfo.Where: AV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AV.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AV.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AV.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

appAPAVGState.dbName: (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=AV.GRG_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=AV.GRG_STATE)

appAPAVRegState.dbName: (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=AV.GRG_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=AV.REGISTERED_STATE)

appAPAVOwnership.dbName: CASE AV.IS_OWN_LEASE WHEN 1 THEN 'Purchased' WHEN 0 THEN 'Leased' ELSE '' END

appAPAVNewUsed.dbName: CASE AV.IS_NEW_USED WHEN 1 THEN 'Used' WHEN 0 THEN 'New' ELSE '' END

appAPAVTransChemical.DisplayName: Is Vehicle involved in transporting chemical, pollution or hazardous materials?

appAPAVWCInsu.DisplayName: Are all drivers covered by WC Insurance?

appAPMiscEquip.Where: MEV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND MEV.APP_ID=@app_Id AND MEV.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND MEV.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId AND MEV.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND MEV.ITEM_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL

appAPAVTotalAmount.dbName: (SELECT REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,SUM(MEV.ITEM_VALUE)),1),'.00','') FROM APP_MISCELLANEOUS_EQUIPMENT_VALUES MEV WHERE MEV.CUSTOMER_ID=AV.CUSTOMER_ID AND MEV.APP_ID=AV.APP_ID AND MEV.APP_VERSION_ID=AV.APP_VERSION_ID AND MEV.VEHICLE_ID=AV.VEHICLE_ID AND MEV.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND MEV.ITEM_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL)

appAPPolLvlCvgs.Table: APP_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='PL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AVC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appAPPolLvlCvgs.Where: AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVC.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appAPAVCPLLimit.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1 IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT) + '/' + REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1),1),'.00','') END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.COV_ID=MC.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=AVC.LIMIT_ID) END

appAPAVCPLSigObt.dbName: CASE ISNULL(MC.ISADDDEDUCTIBLE_APP,0) WHEN 0 THEN 'N.A.' ELSE CASE AVC.SIGNATURE_OBTAINED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END END

appAPVehLvlCvgs.Table: APP_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='RL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AVC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appAPVehLvlCvgs.Where: AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVC.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appAPAVCVLLimit.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.LIMIT_1),1),'.00','') END ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1 IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT) + '/' + REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1),1),'.00','') END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.COV_ID=MC.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=AVC.LIMIT_ID) END

appAPAVCVLDed.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.DEDUC_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NOT NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') + ' ' + CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID = AVC.DEDUC_ID) ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.DEDUCTIBLE_1),1),'.00','') END

appAPAVCVLSigObt.dbName: CASE ISNULL(MC.ISADDDEDUCTIBLE_APP,0) WHEN 0 THEN 'N.A.' ELSE CASE AVC.SIGNATURE_OBTAINED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END END

appAPAVAIHealthCarr.dbName: (SELECT AVC.ADD_INFORMATION FROM APP_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID WHERE AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=AV.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.APP_ID=AV.APP_ID AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID=AV.APP_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=AV.VEHICLE_ID AND MC.COV_CODE='PIP')

appAPAVAINumPersons.dbName: (SELECT REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.ADD_INFORMATION),1),'.00','') FROM APP_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID WHERE AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=AV.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.APP_ID=AV.APP_ID AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID=AV.APP_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=AV.VEHICLE_ID AND MC.COV_CODE='ENO')

appAutoEndorsements.Table: APP_VEHICLE_ENDORSEMENTS AVE INNER JOIN MNT_ENDORSMENT_DETAILS ED ON AVE.ENDORSEMENT_ID=ED.ENDORSMENT_ID
appAutoEndorsements.Where: AVE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AVE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AVE.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY ED.RANK

appAutoAddlIntDtls.Table: APP_ADD_OTHER_INT HAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=HAI.HOLDER_ID
appAutoAddlIntDtls.Where: HAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND HAI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND HAI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND HAI.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId AND HAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

appAPHAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

appAPHAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

appAPHAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

appAPHAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

appAPHAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

appAPHAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

appAPHAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

appAutoDrivers.Where: ADE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND ADE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND ADE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND ADE.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY ADE.DRIVER_FNAME,ADE.DRIVER_MNAME,ADE.DRIVER_LNAME

appHomeDwellInfo.Table: APP_DWELLINGS_INFO DI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DI.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND DI.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND DI.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'HOME' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'

appHomeDWCovSec1Dtls.Table: APP_DWELLING_SECTION_COVERAGES DSC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON DSC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND DSC.COVERAGE_TYPE='S1' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DSC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DSC.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND DSC.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE='HOME' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appHomeDWCovSec1Dtls.Where: DSC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DSC.APP_ID=@app_Id AND DSC.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appHOCS1Included.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.LIMIT_1) END

appHOCS1Deductible.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.DEDUCTIBLE IS NULL THEN 'All Peril Deductible' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE) END

appHomeDWOtherLocDtls.Where: OL.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND OL.APP_ID=@app_Id AND OL.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND OL.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY OL.LOC_NUM

appHOOLPhotoAttch.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=OL.PHOTO_ATTACHED)

appHomeDWCovSec2Dtls.Table: APP_DWELLING_SECTION_COVERAGES DSC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON DSC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND DSC.COVERAGE_TYPE='S2' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DSC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DSC.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND DSC.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE='HOME' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appHomeDWCovSec2Dtls.Where: DSC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DSC.APP_ID=@app_Id AND DSC.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appHOCS2Number.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.LIMIT_1) ELSE '' END

appHOCS2Additional.dbName: (SELECT CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=DSC.LIMIT_ID)

appHomeDWEndorsements.Table: APP_DWELLING_ENDORSEMENTS DE INNER JOIN MNT_ENDORSMENT_DETAILS ED ON DE.ENDORSEMENT_ID=ED.ENDORSMENT_ID
appHomeDWEndorsements.Where: DE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND DE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND DE.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY ED.RANK

appHomeWcraftDtls.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND WI.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appHomeWcraftDtls.Where: WI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY BOAT_NO

appHOWITwinSingle.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.TWIN_SINGLE)

appHOWIHullMaterial.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.HULL_MATERIAL)

appHOWIFuelType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.FUEL_TYPE)

appHOWITerritory.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.TERRITORY)

appHOWINavigated.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.WATERS_NAVIGATED)

appHOWICovTypBasis.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.COV_TYPE_BASIS)

appHOWIMarineSurvey.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.MARINE_SURVEY)

appHOWIPhotoAttch.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.PHOTO_ATTACHED)

appHOWIShore.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.SHORE_STATION)

appHOWIDualOwner.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.DUAL_OWNERSHIP)

appHOWISailboatRace.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.REMOVE_SAILBOAT)

appHOWILoran.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.LORAN_NAV_SYSTEM)

appHomeWIEngineDtls.Where: WEI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WEI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WEI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WEI.ASSOCIATED_BOAT=@boatId AND WEI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WEI.ENGINE_NO

appHOWEIFuelType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WEI.FUEL_TYPE)

appHomeWICovLimitInfo.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_COVERAGE_INFO WCI INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON MC.COV_ID=WCI.COVERAGE_CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WCI.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND WCI.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND WCI.BOAT_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appHomeWICovLimitInfo.Where: WCI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WCI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WCI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WCI.BOAT_ID=@boatId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appHomeWIEndorsements.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_ENDORSEMENTS WE INNER JOIN MNT_ENDORSMENT_DETAILS ED ON ED.ENDORSMENT_ID=WE.ENDORSEMENT_ID
appHomeWIEndorsements.Where: WE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WE.BOAT_ID=@boatId ORDER BY ED.RANK

appHomeWIAddlIntDtls.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_COV_ADD_INT WAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=WAI.HOLDER_ID
appHomeWIAddlIntDtls.Where: WAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WAI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WAI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WAI.BOAT_ID=@boatId AND WAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

appHOWAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

appHOWAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

appHOWAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

appHOWAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

appHOWAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=WAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

appHOWAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=WAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=WAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

appHOWAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

appHomeWIOperators.Where: WDE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WDE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WDE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WDE.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WDE.DRIVER_FNAME,WDE.DRIVER_MNAME,WDE.DRIVER_LNAME

appHOWDEState.dbName: (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=WDE.DRIVER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=WDE.DRIVER_STATE)

appHOWDEGender.dbName: CASE WDE.DRIVER_SEX WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END

appHOWDESafeCourse.DisplayName: Did you take a Water Safety Course?

appHOWDESquadCourse.DisplayName: Do you have a Certificate for Power Squadron Course?

appHOWDEOprtdBoat.dbName: (SELECT WI.MAKE + ' ' + WI.MODEL + '(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),WI.YEAR) + ')' FROM APP_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI WHERE WI.CUSTOMER_ID=WDE.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.APP_ID=WDE.APP_ID AND WI.APP_VERSION_ID=WDE.APP_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=WDE.VEHICLE_ID)

appHomeWIDEMvrInformation.Where: WMR.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WMR.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WMR.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WMR.DRIVER_ID=@driverId AND WMR.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

appHOWMRVioType.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=WMR.VIOLATION_TYPE)

appHOWMRViolation.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=WMR.VIOLATION_ID)

appHOWMRDeath.dbName: CASE WMR.MVR_DEATH WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

appHOWMROrdered.dbName: CASE WMR.VERIFIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appHomeWITrailers.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_TRAILER_INFO WTI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WTI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WTI.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND WTI.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND WTI.TRAILER_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'T' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appHomeWITrailers.Where: WTI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WTI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WTI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WTI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WTI.TRAILER_NO

appHOWTITrailerTyp.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WTI.TRAILER_TYPE)

appHOWTIBoatNum.dbName: (SELECT WI.MAKE + ' ' + WI.MODEL + '(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),WI.YEAR) + ')' FROM APP_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI WHERE WI.CUSTOMER_ID=WTI.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.APP_ID=WTI.APP_ID AND WI.APP_VERSION_ID=WTI.APP_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=WTI.ASSOCIATED_BOAT)

appHomeWTRIAddlIntDtls.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_TRAILER_ADD_INT TAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=TAI.HOLDER_ID
appHomeWTRIAddlIntDtls.Where: TAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND TAI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND TAI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND TAI.TRAILER_ID=@trailerId AND TAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

appHOWTAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

appHOWTAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

appHOWTAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

appHOWTAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

appHOWTAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=TAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

appHOWTAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=TAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=TAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

appHOWTAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

appHomeWIEquipments.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_EQUIP_DETAILLS WED LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WED.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WED.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND WED.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND WED.EQUIP_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'MSE' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appHomeWIEquipments.Where: WED.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WED.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WED.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WED.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WED.EQUIP_NO

appHOWEDEquipTyp.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WED.EQUIPMENT_TYPE)

appHOWEDDesc.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WED.EQUIP_TYPE)

appHOWEDShipShore.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WED.SHIP_TO_SHORE)

appHomeSchItemsCvgs.Table: APP_HOME_OWNER_SCH_ITEMS_CVGS SIC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON MC.COV_ID=SIC.ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON SIC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND SIC.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND SIC.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND PS.RISK_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 DWELLING_ID FROM APP_DWELLINGS_INFO DI WHERE DI.CUSTOMER_ID=SIC.CUSTOMER_ID AND DI.APP_ID=SIC.APP_ID AND DI.APP_VERSION_ID=SIC.APP_VERSION_ID AND DI.IS_ACTIVE='Y') AND RISK_TYPE = 'HOME' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appHomeSchItemsCvgs.Where: SIC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND SIC.APP_ID=@app_Id AND SIC.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id ORDER BY MC.RANK

appHOSIDeductible.dbName: (SELECT CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE MC.COV_ID=CR.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=CONVERT(INT,DEDUCTIBLE))

appHomeSISchItemDtls.Where: SID.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND SID.APP_ID=@app_Id AND SID.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND SID.ITEM_ID=@schItemId AND SID.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY SID.ITEM_NUMBER

appHomeRecreationalVeh.Table: APP_HOME_OWNER_RECREATIONAL_VEHICLES RV LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON RV.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND RV.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND RV.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND RV.REC_VEH_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'RV' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appHomeRecreationalVeh.Where: RV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND RV.APP_ID=@app_Id AND RV.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND RV.ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY RV.COMPANY_ID_NUMBER

appHORVRegOthState.dbName: CASE RV.IS_UNIT_REG_IN_OTHER_STATE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appHORVRiskDecl.dbName: CASE RV.RISK_DECL_BY_OTHER_COMP WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appHORVRaceSpeed.dbName: CASE RV.USED_IN_RACE_SPEED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appHORVModified.dbName: CASE RV.VEHICLE_MODIFIED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appHORVAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN RAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

appHORVAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN RAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

appHORVAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=RAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

appHORVAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=RAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=RAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

appHORVAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN RAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

appHomeSolidFuel.Where: SF.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND SF.APP_ID=@app_Id AND SF.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND SF.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

appHOSFStove.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.STOVE_TYPE)

appHOSFLabLabel.dbName: CASE SF.HAVE_LABORATORY_LABEL WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appHOSFIsUnit.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.IS_UNIT)

appHOSFHeatSource.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.HEATING_SOURCE)

appHOSPCStvInspct.DisplayName: How often is the stove chimney and stove/smoke pipe cleaned and inspected?

appHOSCSTileFuel.DisplayName: If masonry: does tile fuel lining extend from below the stovepipe entry point to the top of the chimney?

appHOSCSGroundUp.dbName: CASE SCS.IS_CHIMNEY_GROUND_UP WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appHOSCSGroundUp.DisplayName: If masonry: is the chimney built from the ground up?

appHOSCSInstHousBlt.dbName: CASE SCS.CHIMNEY_INST_AFTER_HOUSE_BLT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appHOSCSInstHousBlt.DisplayName: Was the chimney installed after the house was built and for this solid fuel heating device?

appHOSCSHdnCombust.dbName: CASE SCS.IS_CHIMNEY_COVERED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appHOSCSHdnCombust.DisplayName: Is chimney covered with or hidden behind a combustible wall?

appHOSCSDistPipe.DisplayName: Give distance from smoke pipe to edges of opening in that wall or cover

appHOSCSDescThimbMat.DisplayName: Describe any thimble or material placed to protect the edges of that opening

appHOSCSStvPipeIs.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SCS.STOVE_PIPE_IS)

appHOSCSSnugly.dbName: CASE SCS.DOES_SMOKE_PIPE_FIT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appHOSCSSnugly.DisplayName: Does the smoke pipe fit snugly into the chimney opening?

appHOSCSWasteHeat.dbName: CASE SCS.SMOKE_PIPE_WASTE_HEAT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appHOSCSWasteHeat.DisplayName: Does the smoke pipe have a waste heat collector/circulator, heat reclaimer, catalytic converter, heat extracto or circulating fan?

appHOSCSSecureCon.dbName: CASE SCS.STOVE_CONN_SECURE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appHOSCSSecureCon.DisplayName: Are stovepipe connections securely fastened to each other with screws at each connection?

appHOSCSPipPasComb.dbName: CASE SCS.SMOKE_PIPE_PASS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appHOSCSPipPasComb.DisplayName: Does the smoke pipe pass through any interior combustible wall, ceiling, closet or concealed are?

appHOSCSThimble.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SCS.SELECT_PASS)

appMCAGISolOwn.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_NON_OWNED_VEH WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appMCAGIExistDmg.dbName: CASE AGI.EXISTING_DMG WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIExistDmg.DisplayName: Any existing damage to a cycle?

appMCAGIInsuComp.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_OTH_INSU_COMP WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIInsuComp.DisplayName: Any other insurance with this company?

appMCAGILicSusp.dbName: CASE AGI.DRIVER_SUS_REVOKED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGILicSusp.DisplayName: Any drivers license been suspended, revoked Or restricted in last 5 years?

appMCAGIPhyImpird.dbName: CASE AGI.PHY_MENTL_CHALLENGED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIPhyImpird.DisplayName: Any driver physically or mentally impaired?

appMCAGIFinRespFil.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_FINANCIAL_RESPONSIBILITY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appMCAGIDateFil.DisplayName: Driver Number And Date of Filing

appMCAGIInsuTrfr.dbName: CASE AGI.INS_AGENCY_TRANSFER WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIInsuTrfr.DisplayName: Has insurance been transferred within the agency?

appMCAGICovDecl.dbName: CASE AGI.COVERAGE_DECLINED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGICovDecl.DisplayName: Has any coverage been declined, cancelled or non-renewed during the last 3 years?

appMCAGIAgentInsp.dbName: CASE AGI.AGENCY_VEH_INSPECTED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIAgentInsp.DisplayName: Has the agent inspected the cycle?

appMCAGISlvgTitle.dbName: CASE AGI.SALVAGE_TITLE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appMCAGICommUse.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_COMMERCIAL_USE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGICommUse.DisplayName: Any commercial, business, or parade use?

appMCAGICyclRace.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_USEDFOR_RACING WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGICyclRace.DisplayName: Any cycle used for racing, hill climbing, motocross or any sporting event?

appMCAGICostOver.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_COST_OVER_DEFINED_LIMIT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGICostOver.DisplayName: Any cycle have cost new or value over $40,000?

appMCAGIMoreWheel.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_MORE_WHEELS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIMoreWheel.DisplayName: Does cycle have more than 2 wheels and/or a side car?

appMCAGIExtdFork.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_EXTENDED_FORKS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIExtdFork.DisplayName: Any cycle with extended forks over 6 inches?

appMCAGINotLicRoad.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_LICENSED_FOR_ROAD WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGINotLicRoad.DisplayName: Is any cycle not licensed for road use?

appMCAGIModiIncrSpeed.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_MODIFIED_INCREASE_SPEED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIModiIncrSpeed.DisplayName: Any cycle modified to increase speed?

appMCAGIModiFrame.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_MODIFIED_KIT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIModiFrame.DisplayName: Any cycle on modified frame, a kit or assembled bike?

appMCAGICarelessDriv.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_CONVICTED_CARELESS_DRIVE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGICarelessDriv.DisplayName: In the last 5 years - have you been convicted of reckless or careless driving, DUIL, DWI?

appMCAGIAccidentDrug.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_CONVICTED_ACCIDENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIAccidentDrug.DisplayName: In the last 5 years - have you been convicted of leaving scene of accident or drug use?

appMCAGIMultiPolicy.dbName: CASE AGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appMCAGIOwnRent.DisplayName: Current Residence is Owned or Rented?

appMCAGILivHouseHold.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_OTHER_THAN_INSURED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGILivHouseHold.DisplayName: Anyone other than insured listed, living in household?

appMCAGIWhichCycl.dbName: CASE AGI.WHICHCYCLE WHEN 0 THEN 'None' ELSE (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),INSURED_VEH_NUMBER) + ' - ' + MAKE FROM APP_VEHICLES AV WHERE AV.CUSTOMER_ID=AGI.CUSTOMER_ID AND AV.APP_ID=AGI.APP_ID AND AV.APP_VERSION_ID=AGI.APP_VERSION_ID AND AV.VEHICLE_ID=AGI.WHICHCYCLE) END

appMCAGIPriorLoss.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_PRIOR_LOSSES WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appMCAGIPersUmbPol.dbName: CASE AGI.APPLY_PERS_UMB_POL WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCAGIPersUmbPol.DisplayName: Does the insured have or applying for a Personal Umbrella Policy?

appCyclMCycleInfo.Table: APP_VEHICLES AV LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AV.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AV.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND AV.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND AV.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appCyclMCycleInfo.Where: AV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AV.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AV.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AV.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY AV.INSURED_VEH_NUMBER

appMCPolLvlCvgs.Table: APP_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='PL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AVC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appMCPolLvlCvgs.Where: AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVC.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appMCAVCPLLimit.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NOT NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') + ' ' + CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1 IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT) + '/' + REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1),1),'.00','') END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.COV_ID=MC.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=AVC.LIMIT_ID) END

appMCAVCPLSigObt.dbName: CASE ISNULL(MC.ISADDDEDUCTIBLE_APP,0) WHEN 0 THEN 'N.A.' ELSE CASE AVC.SIGNATURE_OBTAINED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END END

appMCVehLvlCvgs.Table: APP_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='RL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AVC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appMCVehLvlCvgs.Where: AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVC.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AVC.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appMCAVCVLLimit.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.LIMIT_1),1),'.00','') END ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1 IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT) + '/' + REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1),1),'.00','') END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.COV_ID=MC.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=AVC.LIMIT_ID) END

appMCAVCVLDed.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.DEDUC_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NOT NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') + ' ' + CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID = AVC.DEDUC_ID) ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.DEDUCTIBLE_1),1),'.00','') END

appMCAVCVLSigObt.dbName: CASE ISNULL(MC.ISADDDEDUCTIBLE_APP,0) WHEN 0 THEN 'N.A.' ELSE CASE AVC.SIGNATURE_OBTAINED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END END

appCyclEndorsements.Table: APP_VEHICLE_ENDORSEMENTS AVE INNER JOIN MNT_ENDORSMENT_DETAILS ED ON AVE.ENDORSEMENT_ID=ED.ENDORSMENT_ID
appCyclEndorsements.Where: AVE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AVE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AVE.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY ED.RANK

appCyclAddlIntDtls.Table: APP_ADD_OTHER_INT HAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=HAI.HOLDER_ID
appCyclAddlIntDtls.Where: HAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND HAI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND HAI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND HAI.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId AND HAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

appMCHAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

appMCHAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

appMCHAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

appMCHAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

appMCHAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

appMCHAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

appMCHAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

appCyclDriverInfo.Where: ADE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND ADE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND ADE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND ADE.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY ADE.DRIVER_FNAME,ADE.DRIVER_MNAME,ADE.DRIVER_LNAME

appMCADEGender.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_SEX WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END

appMCADEMartSta.dbName: (SELECT LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES A INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES B ON A.LOOKUP_ID=B.LOOKUP_ID AND LOOKUP_NAME = 'MARST' WHERE LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE = ADE.DRIVER_MART_STAT)

appMCADEUSCitzn.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_US_CITIZEN WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appMCADEDrugVio.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_DRINK_VIOLATION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appMCADEDrugVio.DisplayName: Drinking or Drug Related violation in last 5 years?

appMCADECyclEndo.dbName: CASE ADE.NO_CYCLE_ENDMT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appMCADEDriveCycl.dbName: (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,INSURED_VEH_NUMBER)+' '+VEHICLE_YEAR+' '+MAKE FROM APP_VEHICLES AV WHERE AV.CUSTOMER_ID=ADE.CUSTOMER_ID AND AV.APP_ID=ADE.APP_ID AND AV.APP_VERSION_ID=ADE.APP_VERSION_ID AND AV.VEHICLE_ID=ADE.VEHICLE_ID)

appCyclADEMvrInformation.Where: AMR.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AMR.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AMR.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AMR.DRIVER_ID=@driverId AND AMR.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

appMCAMRVioType.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=AMR.VIOLATION_TYPE)

appMCAMRViolation.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=AMR.VIOLATION_ID)

appMCAMRDeath.dbName: CASE AMR.MVR_DEATH WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

appMCAMROrdered.dbName: CASE AMR.VERIFIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIIsVacant.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_VACENT_OCCUPY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIIsVacant.DisplayName: Is dwelling currently Vacant or Unoccupied?

appRDGIIsDwelRent.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_RENTED_IN_PART WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIIsDwelRent.DisplayName: Is dwelling rented in whole or part to students under age 30?

appRDGIIsDwellOwned.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_DWELLING_OWNED_BY_OTHER WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIIsDwellOwned.DisplayName: Is dwelling owned by anyone other than an individual?

appRDGIBusiConduct.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_FARMING_BUSINESS_COND WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIDayCare.dbName: CASE RDGI.PROVIDE_HOME_DAY_CARE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIDayCare.DisplayName: Provide Home Day Care for Monetary or other compensation?

appRDGIModular.dbName: CASE RDGI.MODULAR_MANUFACTURED_HOME WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIFoundation.dbName: CASE RDGI.BUILT_ON_CONTINUOUS_FOUNDATION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIFoundation.DisplayName: Is it Built on a continuous foundation ?

appRDGILocaCommercial.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_PROP_NEXT_COMMERICAL WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGILocaCommercial.DisplayName: Is property located next to a commercial building?

appRDGIStairways.dbName: CASE RDGI.ARE_STAIRWAYS_PRESENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIAnyPet.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANIMALS_EXO_PETS_HISTORY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIAnyHotTub.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_SWIMPOLL_HOTTUB WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIAnyHotTub.DisplayName: Is there an enclosed swimming pool or hot tub (not including bathroom type Jacuzzi or hot tub)?

appRDGIHotTubDesc.DisplayName: Enclosed swimming pool or hot tub description

appRDGIValuedCustomer.dbName: CASE RDGI.VALUED_CUSTOMER_DISCOUNT_OVERRIDE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIInsuTrnsfrAgency.dbName: CASE RDGI.HAS_INSU_TRANSFERED_AGENCY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIInsuTrnsfrAgency.DisplayName: Has insurance been transferred within the agency?

appRDGIOwnerChanged.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_OWNERS_DWELLING_CHANGED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIOwnerChanged.DisplayName: Has ownership of this dwelling changed more than one time in the last 3 years?

appRDGIAnyCovDecline.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_COV_DECLINED_CANCELED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIAnyCovDecline.DisplayName: Any coverage declined, cancelled or non-renewed during the last 3 years?

appRDGIConvictArson.dbName: CASE RDGI.CONVICTION_DEGREE_IN_PAST WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIConvictArson.DisplayName: Conviction of any degree of arson in last 3 years?

appRDGILeadPaint.dbName: CASE RDGI.LEAD_PAINT_HAZARD WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIMultiPolicy.dbName: CASE RDGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIResiEmployee.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_RESIDENCE_EMPLOYEE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIResiOwned.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_OTHER_RESI_OWNED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIResiOwned.DisplayName: Any other residence owned, occupied or rented?

appRDGIOtherInsurance.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_OTH_INSU_COMP WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIOtherInsurance.DisplayName: Any other insurance with this company?

appRDGIRenovation.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_RENOVATION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIDescRenovate.DisplayName: Est. completion date and value, if undergoing renovation

appRDGITrampoline.dbName: CASE RDGI.TRAMPOLINE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIRoomers.dbName: CASE RDGI.RENTERS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIHeatSource.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_HEATING_SOURCE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIHeatSource.DisplayName: Any supplemental heating source(wood stove,fireplace inserts,etc.)?

appRDGIBuildUndConst.dbName: CASE RDGI.BUILD_UNDER_CON_GEN_CONT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIBuildUndConst.DisplayName: If Building is Under Construction, is the Applicant the General Contractor?

appRDGISwimPool.dbName: CASE RDGI.SWIMMING_POOL WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGISwimPoolType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = 'SPLCD' AND MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=CONVERT(VARCHAR,RDGI.SWIMMING_POOL_TYPE))

appRDGIApprovFence.dbName: CASE RDGI.APPROVED_FENCE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIDivinBoard.dbName: CASE RDGI.DIVING_BOARD WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGISlide.dbName: CASE RDGI.SLIDE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDGIMoreAcre.dbName: CASE RDGI.PROPERTY_ON_MORE_THAN WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIMoreAcre.DisplayName: Is Property situated on more than 5 Acres?

appRDGIMobileHome.dbName: CASE RDGI.DWELLING_MOBILE_HOME WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIMobileHome.DisplayName: Is the dwelling a mobile home or double wide?

appRDGIUseWholePart.dbName: CASE RDGI.PROPERTY_USED_WHOLE_PART WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDGIUseWholePart.DisplayName: Is Property Used in whole or in part for farming, commercial, industrial, professional or business purposes except if use is incidental?

appRentLocDtls.Where: AL.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AL.APP_ID=@app_Id AND AL.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND AL.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY AL.LOC_NUM

appRDLocIsPrim.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=AL.LOCATION_TYPE)

appRDLocWeekBasis.dbName: CASE AL.RENTED_WEEKLY WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDLocWeekBasis.DisplayName: Is location rented on a Weekly Basis?

appRDLocCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=AL.LOC_COUNTRY)

appRDLocState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=AL.LOC_COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=AL.LOC_STATE)

appRentDwellInfo.Table: APP_DWELLINGS_INFO DI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DI.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND DI.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND DI.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'RENTAL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appRentDwellInfo.Where: DI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND DI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND DI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY DI.DWELLING_NUMBER

appRDDILocation.dbName: (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,AL.LOC_NUM) + '- ' + AL.LOC_ADD1 + ' ' + AL.LOC_ADD2 + ', ' + AL.LOC_CITY + ', ' + SL.STATE_NAME + ', '+ AL.LOC_ZIP FROM APP_LOCATIONS AL INNER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST SL ON SL.COUNTRY_ID=AL.LOC_COUNTRY AND SL.STATE_ID=AL.LOC_STATE WHERE AL.CUSTOMER_ID=DI.CUSTOMER_ID AND AL.APP_ID=DI.APP_ID AND AL.APP_VERSION_ID=DI.APP_VERSION_ID)

appRDDIBuildType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=DI.BUILDING_TYPE)

appRDDIOccupancy.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=DI.OCCUPANCY)

appRDDINeighbors.dbName: CASE DI.NEIGHBOURS_VISIBLE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDDIOccupied.dbName: CASE DI.OCCUPIED_DAILY WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRentDWOthStruDtls.Where: OS.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND OS.APP_ID=@app_Id AND OS.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND OS.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId AND OS.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY OS.OTHER_STRUCTURE_ID

appRDOSPicAttach.dbName: CASE OS.PICTURE_ATTACHED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDOSCovBasis.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=OS.COVERAGE_BASIS)

appRDOSAmtDesire.DisplayName: Additional Amount of Insurance Desired (Coverage B)

appRDOSSatelitEq.dbName: CASE OS.SATELLITE_EQUIPMENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRentDWRatingInfo.Where: RI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND RI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND RI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND RI.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId

appRDRIProtClas.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.PROT_CLASS)

appRDRIDwelUndConst.dbName: CASE RI.IS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appRDRIWolAutoPol.dbName: CASE RI.IS_AUTO_POL_WITH_CARRIER WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appRDRIWolAutoPol.DisplayName: Does Wolverine Mutual write your Auto policy?

appRDRICircuitBreak.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.CIRCUIT_BREAKERS)

appRDRIFoundation.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.FOUNDATION)

appRDRIRoofType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.ROOF_TYPE)

appRDRIRoofDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN RI.ROOF_OTHER_DESC IS NULL OR RI.ROOF_OTHER_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A' ELSE RI.ROOF_OTHER_DESC END

appRDRIPrimHeatDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN RI.PRIMARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC IS NULL OR RI.PRIMARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A' ELSE RI.PRIMARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC END

appRDRISecondHeatDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN RI.SECONDARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC IS NULL OR RI.SECONDARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A' ELSE RI.SECONDARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC END

appRDRISprinker.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.SPRINKER)

appRDRINumLocAlrm.DisplayName: Number of local alarms applies to smoke or gas alarms

appRentDWAddlIntDtls.Table: APP_HOME_OWNER_ADD_INT HAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=HAI.HOLDER_ID
appRentDWAddlIntDtls.Where: HAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND HAI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND HAI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND HAI.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId AND HAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

appRDHAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

appRDHAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

appRDHAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

appRDHAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

appRDHAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

appRDHAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

appRDHAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

appRentDWCovSec1Dtls.Table: APP_DWELLING_SECTION_COVERAGES DSC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON DSC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='S1' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DSC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DSC.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND DSC.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'RENTAL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appRentDWCovSec1Dtls.Where: DSC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DSC.APP_ID=@app_Id AND DSC.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appRDCS1Included.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.LIMIT_1) END

appRDCS1Deductible.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.DEDUCTIBLE IS NULL THEN 'All Peril Deductible' ELSE CASE WHEN DSC.DEDUCTIBLE_TEXT IS NULL OR DSC.DEDUCTIBLE_TEXT = '' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE) ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE) + DSC.DEDUCTIBLE_TEXT END END

appRentDWCovSec2Dtls.Table: APP_DWELLING_SECTION_COVERAGES DSC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON DSC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='S2' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DSC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DSC.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND DSC.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'RENTAL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appRentDWCovSec2Dtls.Where: DSC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DSC.APP_ID=@app_Id AND DSC.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appRDCS2Included.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT1_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE DSC.LIMIT1_AMOUNT_TEXT END ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.LIMIT_1) END

appRDCS2Additional.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT1_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NOT NULL THEN 'No Coverage' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE_1) END

appRDCS2Deductible.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.DEDUCTIBLE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE) END

appRentDWEndorsements.Table: APP_DWELLING_ENDORSEMENTS DE INNER JOIN MNT_ENDORSMENT_DETAILS ED ON DE.ENDORSEMENT_ID=ED.ENDORSMENT_ID
appRentDWEndorsements.Where: DE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND DE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND DE.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY ED.RANK

appWCGIImpaired.dbName: CASE WGI.PHY_MENTL_CHALLENGED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appWCGIImpaired.DisplayName: Any operator physically or mentally impaired?

appWCGIImpairDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.PHY_MENTL_CHALLENGED_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.PHY_MENTL_CHALLENGED_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.PHY_MENTL_CHALLENGED_DESC END

appWCGILicSuspend.dbName: CASE WGI.DRIVER_SUS_REVOKED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appWCGILicDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.DRIVER_SUS_REVOKED_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.DRIVER_SUS_REVOKED_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.DRIVER_SUS_REVOKED_DESC END

appWCGIMajorViolat.dbName: CASE WGI.IS_CONVICTED_ACCIDENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appWCGIMajorViolat.DisplayName: Any operator convicted of a major violation in the last 5 years?

appWCGIMajVioDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.IS_CONVICTED_ACCIDENT_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.IS_CONVICTED_ACCIDENT_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.IS_CONVICTED_ACCIDENT_DESC END

appWCGIDrinkDrugVio.dbName: CASE WGI.DRINK_DRUG_VOILATION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appWCGILossVassel.dbName: CASE WGI.ANY_LOSS_THREE_YEARS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appWCGILossDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.ANY_LOSS_THREE_YEARS_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.ANY_LOSS_THREE_YEARS_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.ANY_LOSS_THREE_YEARS_DESC END

appWCGICovDecline.dbName: CASE WGI.COVERAGE_DECLINED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appWCGICovDecline.DisplayName: Has any applicant's watercraft coverage been refused, cancelled or non renewed in the last 12 months by any insurer?

appWCGIDeclinDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.COVERAGE_DECLINED_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.COVERAGE_DECLINED_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.COVERAGE_DECLINED_DESC END

appWCGIRentOther.dbName: CASE WGI.IS_RENTED_OTHERS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appWCGIRentOther.DisplayName: Is any boat rented to others?

appWCGIRentDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.IS_RENTED_OTHERS_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.IS_RENTED_OTHERS_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.IS_RENTED_OTHERS_DESC END

appWCGICoOwned.dbName: CASE WGI.IS_BOAT_COOWNED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appWCGICoOwnDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.IS_BOAT_COOWNED_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.IS_BOAT_COOWNED_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.IS_BOAT_COOWNED_DESC END

appWCGIBoatRegAnyOne.dbName: CASE WGI.IS_REGISTERED_OTHERS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appWCGIBoatRegAnyOne.DisplayName: Is any boat registered to anyone other than applicant?

appWCGIRegistDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.IS_REGISTERED_OTHERS_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.IS_REGISTERED_OTHERS_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.IS_REGISTERED_OTHERS_DESC END

appWCGIAnyRace.dbName: CASE WGI.PARTICIPATE_RACE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appWCGIAnyRace.DisplayName: Is any boat used to participate in any race,speed, or fishing contest other than a Sailboat under 26ft?

appWCGIBoatDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.PARTICIPATE_RACE_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.PARTICIPATE_RACE_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.PARTICIPATE_RACE_DESC END

appWCGICarryPasngr.dbName: CASE WGI.CARRY_PASSENGER_FOR_CHARGE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appWCGICarryPasngr.DisplayName: Is any boat used to carry passengers for a charge?

appWCGIChrgDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.CARRY_PASSENGER_FOR_CHARGE_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.CARRY_PASSENGER_FOR_CHARGE_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.CARRY_PASSENGER_FOR_CHARGE_DESC END
appWCGIChrgDesc.DisplayName: Boat used to carry passengers for a charge description

appWCGIPriorCarr.dbName: CASE WGI.IS_PRIOR_INSURANCE_CARRIER WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appWCGINameCarr.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.PRIOR_INSURANCE_CARRIER_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.PRIOR_INSURANCE_CARRIER_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.PRIOR_INSURANCE_CARRIER_DESC END

appWCGIMultiPolicy.dbName: CASE WGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appWCGIPolNum.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED_PP_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED_PP_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED_PP_DESC END

appWCGIAmphibious.dbName: CASE WGI.ANY_BOAT_AMPHIBIOUS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appWCGIAmphibious.DisplayName: Are any of the boats Hydrofoils, Swamp Buggies, Collapsible, Experimental, Converted Military Craft Single Passenger or Amphibious?

appWCGIAmphiDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.ANY_BOAT_AMPHIBIOUS_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.ANY_BOAT_AMPHIBIOUS_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.ANY_BOAT_AMPHIBIOUS_DESC END

appWCGIBoatUseResi.dbName: CASE WGI.ANY_BOAT_RESIDENCE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
appWCGIBoatUseResi.DisplayName: Is any boat used as a residence?

appWCGIBoatResiDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN WGI.ANY_BOAT_RESIDENCE_DESC IS NULL OR WGI.ANY_BOAT_RESIDENCE_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A.' ELSE WGI.ANY_BOAT_RESIDENCE_DESC END

appBoatWcraftDtls.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND WI.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appBoatWcraftDtls.Where: WI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY BOAT_NO

appWCITwinSingle.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.TWIN_SINGLE)

appWCIHullMaterial.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.HULL_MATERIAL)

appWCIFuelType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.FUEL_TYPE)

appWCITerritory.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.TERRITORY)

appWCINavigated.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.WATERS_NAVIGATED)

appWCICovTypBasis.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.COV_TYPE_BASIS)

appWCIMarineSurvey.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.MARINE_SURVEY)

appWCIPhotoAttch.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.PHOTO_ATTACHED)

appWCIShore.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.SHORE_STATION)

appWCIDualOwner.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.DUAL_OWNERSHIP)

appWCISailboatRace.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.REMOVE_SAILBOAT)

appWCILoran.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WI.LORAN_NAV_SYSTEM)
appWCILoran.DisplayName: Loran Navigation System, GPS or Depth Sounder and Ship to Shore Radio

appBoatWIEngineDtls.Where: WEI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WEI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WEI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WEI.ASSOCIATED_BOAT=@boatId AND WEI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WEI.ENGINE_NO

appWCEIFuelType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WEI.FUEL_TYPE)

appBoatWICovLimitInfo.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_COVERAGE_INFO WCI INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON MC.COV_ID=WCI.COVERAGE_CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WCI.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND WCI.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND WCI.BOAT_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
appBoatWICovLimitInfo.Where: WCI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WCI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WCI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WCI.BOAT_ID=@boatId ORDER BY MC.RANK

appBoatWIEndorsements.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_ENDORSEMENTS WE INNER JOIN MNT_ENDORSMENT_DETAILS ED ON ED.ENDORSMENT_ID=WE.ENDORSEMENT_ID
appBoatWIEndorsements.Where: WE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WE.BOAT_ID=@boatId ORDER BY ED.RANK

appBoatWIAddlIntDtls.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_COV_ADD_INT WAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=WAI.HOLDER_ID
appBoatWIAddlIntDtls.Where: WAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WAI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WAI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WAI.BOAT_ID=@boatId AND WAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

appWCAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

appWCAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

appWCAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

appWCAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

appWCAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=WAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

appWCAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=WAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=WAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

appWCAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN WAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

appBoatWIOperators.Where: WDE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WDE.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WDE.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WDE.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WDE.DRIVER_FNAME,WDE.DRIVER_MNAME,WDE.DRIVER_LNAME

appWCDEState.dbName: (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=WDE.DRIVER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=WDE.DRIVER_STATE)

appWCDEGender.dbName: CASE WDE.DRIVER_SEX WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END

appWCDESafeCourse.DisplayName: Did you take a Water Safety Course?

appWCDESquadCourse.DisplayName: Do you have a Certificate for Power Squadron Course?

appWCDEOprtdBoat.dbName: (SELECT WI.MAKE + ' ' + WI.MODEL + '(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),WI.YEAR) + ')' FROM APP_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI WHERE WI.CUSTOMER_ID=WDE.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.APP_ID=WDE.APP_ID AND WI.APP_VERSION_ID=WDE.APP_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=WDE.VEHICLE_ID)

appBoatWIDEMvrInformation.Where: WMR.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WMR.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WMR.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WMR.DRIVER_ID=@driverId AND WMR.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

appWCMRVioType.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=WMR.VIOLATION_TYPE)

appWCMRViolation.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=WMR.VIOLATION_ID)

appWCMRDeath.dbName: CASE WMR.MVR_DEATH WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

appWCMROrdered.dbName: CASE WMR.VERIFIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

appBoatWITrailers.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_TRAILER_INFO WTI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WTI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WTI.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND WTI.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND WTI.TRAILER_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'T' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appBoatWITrailers.Where: WTI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WTI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WTI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WTI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WTI.TRAILER_NO

appWCTITrailerTyp.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WTI.TRAILER_TYPE)

appWCTIBoatNum.dbName: (SELECT WI.MAKE + ' ' + WI.MODEL + '(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),WI.YEAR) + ')' FROM APP_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI WHERE WI.CUSTOMER_ID=WTI.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.APP_ID=WTI.APP_ID AND WI.APP_VERSION_ID=WTI.APP_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=WTI.ASSOCIATED_BOAT)

appBoatWTRIAddlIntDtls.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_TRAILER_ADD_INT TAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=TAI.HOLDER_ID
appBoatWTRIAddlIntDtls.Where: TAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND TAI.APP_ID=@app_Id AND TAI.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND TAI.TRAILER_ID=@trailerId AND TAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

appWCTAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

appWCTAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

appWCTAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

appWCTAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

appWCTAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=TAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

appWCTAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=TAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=TAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

appWCTAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

appBoatWIEquipments.Table: APP_WATERCRAFT_EQUIP_DETAILLS WED LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WED.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WED.APP_ID = PS.APP_ID AND WED.APP_VERSION_ID = PS.APP_VERSION_ID AND WED.EQUIP_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'MSE' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
appBoatWIEquipments.Where: WED.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WED.APP_ID=@app_Id AND WED.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id AND WED.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WED.EQUIP_NO

appWCEDEquipTyp.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WED.EQUIPMENT_TYPE)

appWCEDDesc.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WED.EQUIP_TYPE)

appWCEDShipShore.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WED.SHIP_TO_SHORE)

appUMBSchUnderly.Table: APP_UMBRELLA_UNDERLYING_POLICIES UUP INNER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER LM ON LOB_ID=UUP.POLICY_LOB
appUMBSchUnderly.Where: UUP.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND UUP.APP_ID=@app_Id AND UUP.APP_VERSION_ID=@app_Version_Id ORDER BY UUP.POLICY_NUMBER

appUMBUDDBoat.dbName: (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(5),UVI.BOAT_NO) + ' ' + UVI.MAKE + ' ' + UVI.MODEL + ' (' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(5),UVI.YEAR) + ')' FROM APP_UMBRELLA_WATERCRAFT_INFO UVI WHERE UVI.CUSTOMER_ID=UDD.CUSTOMER_ID AND UVI.APP_ID=UDD.APP_ID AND UVI.APP_VERSION_ID=UDD.APP_VERSION_ID AND UVI.BOAT_ID=UDD.OP_VEHICLE_ID)

polNameInsuredDetails.Where: PAL.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND PAL.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND PAL.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND PAL.APPLICANT_ID = @applicant_Id

palPolNameInsCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.COUNTRY)

palPolNameInsState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=CAL.STATE)

palPolNameInsEmpAppliOccu.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = '%OCC' AND MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_OCCU)

palPolNameInsEmpCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_EMPL_COUNTRY)

palPolNameInsEmpState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_EMPL_COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=CAL.CO_APPLI_EMPL_STATE)

polAGIVehSolOwn.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_NON_OWNED_VEH WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGICarModified.dbName: CASE AGI.CAR_MODIFIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGIExistDmg.dbName: CASE AGI.EXISTING_DMG WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGIAnyCarSch.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_CAR_AT_SCH WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGIAutoInsu.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_OTH_AUTO_INSU WHEN '1' THEN 'Yes' WHEN '0' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGIVehOutState.dbName: CASE AGI.H_MEM_IN_MILITARY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGILicSusRevk.dbName: CASE AGI.DRIVER_SUS_REVOKED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGIPhyImprd.dbName: CASE AGI.PHY_MENTL_CHALLENGED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGIInsTrfrAgency.dbName: CASE AGI.INS_AGENCY_TRANSFER WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGICovgDecl.dbName: CASE AGI.COVERAGE_DECLINED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
