polAGIAgentInsp.dbName: CASE AGI.AGENCY_VEH_INSPECTED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polAGIAgentInsp.DisplayName: Has the agent inspected the vehicle?

polAGILiveryRent.dbName: CASE AGI.USE_AS_TRANSPORT_FEE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polAGILiveryRent.DisplayName: Is any vehicle used for Livery, rental, passenger hire, or to transport persons to work for a fee?

polAGISalvageTitle.dbName: CASE AGI.SALVAGE_TITLE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGIAntiqueAuto.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_ANTIQUE_AUTO WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polAGIAntiqueAuto.DisplayName: Any vehicle considered an antique auto?

polAGIMultiPolicy.dbName: CASE AGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGIOwnRent.DisplayName: Current Residence is Owned or Rented?

polAGIDrvNotList.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_OTHER_THAN_INSURED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polAGIDrvNotList.DisplayName: Any other licensed drivers in the household that are not listed or rated on this policy

polAGIInsuElseWhere.dbName: CASE AGI.INSUREDELSEWHERE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAGIOPriorLoss.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_PRIOR_LOSSES WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAPVehicleInfo.Table: POL_VEHICLES AV LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AV.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AV.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AV.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
polAPVehicleInfo.Where: AV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AV.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AV.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

polAPAVGState.dbName: (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=AV.GRG_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=AV.GRG_STATE)

polAPAVRegState.dbName: (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=AV.GRG_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=AV.REGISTERED_STATE)

polAPAVOwnership.dbName: CASE AV.IS_OWN_LEASE WHEN 1 THEN 'Purchased' WHEN 0 THEN 'Leased' ELSE '' END

polAPAVNewUsed.dbName: CASE AV.IS_NEW_USED WHEN 1 THEN 'Used' WHEN 0 THEN 'New' ELSE '' END

polAPAVTransChemical.DisplayName: Is Vehicle involved in transporting chemical, pollution or hazardous materials?

polAPAVWCInsu.DisplayName: Are all drivers covered by WC Insurance?

polAPMiscEquip.Where: MEV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND MEV.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND MEV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND MEV.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId AND MEV.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND MEV.ITEM_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL

polAPAVTotalAmount.dbName: (SELECT REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,SUM(MEV.ITEM_VALUE)),1),'.00','') FROM POL_MISCELLANEOUS_EQUIPMENT_VALUES MEV WHERE MEV.CUSTOMER_ID=AV.CUSTOMER_ID AND MEV.POLICY_ID=AV.POLICY_ID AND MEV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND MEV.VEHICLE_ID=AV.VEHICLE_ID AND MEV.IS_ACTIVE='Y' AND MEV.ITEM_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL)

polAPPolLvlCvgs.Table: POL_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='PL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AVC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polAPPolLvlCvgs.Where: AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY MC.RANK

polAPAVCPLLimit.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1 IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT) + '/' + REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1),1),'.00','') END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.COV_ID=MC.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=AVC.LIMIT_ID) END

polAPAVCPLSigObt.dbName: CASE ISNULL(MC.ISADDDEDUCTIBLE_APP,0) WHEN 0 THEN 'N.A.' ELSE CASE AVC.SIGNATURE_OBTAINED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END END

polAPVehLvlCvgs.Table: POL_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='RL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AVC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polAPVehLvlCvgs.Where: AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY MC.RANK

polAPAVCVLLimit.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.LIMIT_1),1),'.00','') END ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1 IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT) + '/' + REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1),1),'.00','') END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.COV_ID=MC.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=AVC.LIMIT_ID) END

polAPAVCVLDed.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.DEDUC_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NOT NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') + ' ' + CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID = AVC.DEDUC_ID) ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.DEDUCTIBLE_1),1),'.00','') END

polAPAVCVLSigObt.dbName: CASE ISNULL(MC.ISADDDEDUCTIBLE_APP,0) WHEN 0 THEN 'N.A.' ELSE CASE AVC.SIGNATURE_OBTAINED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END END

polAPAVAIHealthCarr.dbName: (SELECT AVC.ADD_INFORMATION FROM POL_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID WHERE AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=AV.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.POLICY_ID=AV.POLICY_ID AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=AV.VEHICLE_ID AND MC.COV_CODE='PIP')

polAPAVAINumPersons.dbName: (SELECT REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.ADD_INFORMATION),1),'.00','') FROM POL_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID WHERE AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=AV.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.POLICY_ID=AV.POLICY_ID AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=AV.VEHICLE_ID AND MC.COV_CODE='ENO')

polAutoEndorsements.Table: POL_VEHICLE_ENDORSEMENTS AVE INNER JOIN MNT_ENDORSMENT_DETAILS ED ON AVE.ENDORSEMENT_ID=ED.ENDORSMENT_ID
polAutoEndorsements.Where: AVE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVE.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AVE.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AVE.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY ED.RANK

polAutoAddlIntDtls.Table: POL_ADD_OTHER_INT HAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=HAI.HOLDER_ID
polAutoAddlIntDtls.Where: HAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND HAI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND HAI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND HAI.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId AND HAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

polAPHAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

polAPHAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

polAPHAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

polAPHAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

polAPHAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

polAPHAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

polAPHAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

polAutoDrivers.Where: ADE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND ADE.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND ADE.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND ADE.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY ADE.DRIVER_FNAME,ADE.DRIVER_MNAME,ADE.DRIVER_LNAME

polAPADEState.dbName: (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=ADE.DRIVER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=ADE.DRIVER_STATE)

polAPADEMartStat.dbName: (SELECT LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES A INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES B ON A.LOOKUP_ID=B.LOOKUP_ID AND LOOKUP_NAME = 'MARST' WHERE LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE = ADE.DRIVER_MART_STAT)

polAPADEGender.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_SEX WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END

polAPADEExtNonOwnCov.DisplayName: Extended Non-Owned Coverage for Named Individual Required

polAPADEVolunteer.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_VOLUNTEER_POLICE_FIRE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAPADEUSCitizen.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_US_CITIZEN WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAPADECollegeStud.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_STUD_DIST_OVER_HUNDRED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAPADEStationedTerr.DisplayName: Are you stationed in US, Canada or Puerto Rico or other US Territories?

polAPADEHaveCar.DisplayName: Do you have the car with you?

polAPADEDrugVio.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_DRINK_VIOLATION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polAPADEDrugVio.DisplayName: Drinking or Drug Related violation in last 5 years?

polAPADESafeDrvrDisc.dbName: CASE CONVERT(INT,ADE.SAFE_DRIVER_RENEWAL_DISCOUNT) WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAPADEGoodStud.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_GOOD_STUDENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAPADEFullTimeStud.dbName: CASE ADE.FULL_TIME_STUDENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAPADESupportDoc.dbName: CASE ADE.SUPPORT_DOCUMENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAPADEPremDriver.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_PREF_RISK WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polAPADEAssignVeh.Table: POL_VEHICLES AV INNER JOIN POL_DRIVER_ASSIGNED_VEHICLE AD ON AV.CUSTOMER_ID=AD.CUSTOMER_ID AND AV.POLICY_ID=AD.POLICY_ID AND AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=AD.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AV.VEHICLE_ID=AD.VEHICLE_ID INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV ON MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=AD.APP_VEHICLE_PRIN_OCC_ID
polAPADEAssignVeh.Where: AV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AV.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AD.DRIVER_ID=@driverId

polAutoADEMvrInformation.Where: AMR.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AMR.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AMR.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AMR.DRIVER_ID=@driverId AND AMR.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

polAPAMRVioType.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=AMR.VIOLATION_TYPE)

polAPAMRViolation.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=AMR.VIOLATION_ID)

polAPAMRDeath.dbName: CASE AMR.MVR_DEATH WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

polAPAMROrdered.dbName: CASE AMR.VERIFIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIIsVacant.DisplayName: Is dwelling currently Vacant or Unoccupied?

polHOGIBusiConduct.dbName: CASE HOGI.ANY_FARMING_BUSINESS_COND WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIDayCare.dbName: CASE HOGI.PROVIDE_HOME_DAY_CARE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGILocaCommercial.dbName: CASE HOGI.IS_PROP_NEXT_COMMERICAL WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIStairways.dbName: CASE HOGI.ARE_STAIRWAYS_PRESENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIAnyPet.dbName: CASE HOGI.ANIMALS_EXO_PETS_HISTORY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIAnyHotTub.dbName: CASE HOGI.IS_SWIMPOLL_HOTTUB WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIValuedCustomer.dbName: CASE HOGI.VALUED_CUSTOMER_DISCOUNT_OVERRIDE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIInsuTrnsfrAgency.dbName: CASE HOGI.HAS_INSU_TRANSFERED_AGENCY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOGIInsuTrnsfrAgency.DisplayName: Has insurance been transferred within the agency?

polHOGIOwnerChanged.dbName: CASE HOGI.IS_OWNERS_DWELLING_CHANGED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOGIOwnerChanged.DisplayName: Has ownership of this dwelling changed more than one time in the last 3 years?

polHOGIConvictArson.dbName: CASE HOGI.CONVICTION_DEGREE_IN_PAST WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGILeadPaint.dbName: CASE HOGI.LEAD_PAINT_HAZARD WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIMultiPolicy.dbName: CASE HOGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIResiEmployee.dbName: CASE HOGI.ANY_RESIDENCE_EMPLOYEE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIResiOwned.dbName: CASE HOGI.ANY_OTHER_RESI_OWNED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIOtherInsurance.dbName: CASE HOGI.ANY_OTH_INSU_COMP WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIRenovation.dbName: CASE HOGI.ANY_RENOVATION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIDescRenovate.DisplayName: Est. completion date and value, if undergoing renovation

polHOGITrampoline.dbName: CASE HOGI.TRAMPOLINE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIRoomers.dbName: CASE HOGI.RENTERS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIHeatSource.dbName: CASE HOGI.ANY_HEATING_SOURCE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGISwimPool.dbName: CASE HOGI.SWIMMING_POOL WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGISwimPoolType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = 'SPLCD' AND MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=CONVERT(VARCHAR,HOGI.SWIMMING_POOL_TYPE))

polHOGIApprovFence.dbName: CASE HOGI.APPROVED_FENCE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIDivinBoard.dbName: CASE HOGI.DIVING_BOARD WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGISlide.dbName: CASE HOGI.SLIDE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIAnyFarming.dbName: CASE HOGI.ANY_FORMING WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOGIFarmingDtls.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=HOGI.PREMISES)

polHOGIAnyHorses.dbName: CASE HOGI.ISANY_HORSE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHOWGIImpaired.dbName: CASE WGI.PHY_MENTL_CHALLENGED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOWGIImpaired.DisplayName: Any operator physically or mentally impaired?

polHOWGILicSuspend.dbName: CASE WGI.DRIVER_SUS_REVOKED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHomeDwellInfo.Table: POL_DWELLINGS_INFO DI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DI.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND DI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND DI.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE='HOME' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
polHomeDwellInfo.Where: DI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND DI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND DI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY DI.DWELLING_NUMBER

polHOHAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

polHomeDWCovSec1Dtls.Table: POL_DWELLING_SECTION_COVERAGES DSC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON DSC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND DSC.COVERAGE_TYPE='S1' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DSC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DSC.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND DSC.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'HOME' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polHomeDWCovSec1Dtls.Where: DSC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DSC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND DSC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY MC.RANK

polHOCS1Included.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.LIMIT_1) END

polHOCS1Deductible.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.DEDUCTIBLE IS NULL THEN 'All Peril Deductible' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE) END

polHOOLPhotoAttch.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=OL.PHOTO_ATTACHED)

polHomeDWCovSec2Dtls.Table: POL_DWELLING_SECTION_COVERAGES DSC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON DSC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND DSC.COVERAGE_TYPE='S2' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DSC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DSC.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND DSC.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'HOME' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polHomeDWCovSec2Dtls.Where: DSC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DSC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND DSC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY MC.RANK

polHOCS2Number.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.LIMIT_1) ELSE '' END

polHOCS2Additional.dbName: (SELECT CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=DSC.LIMIT_ID)

polHomeWcraftDtls.Table: POL_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND WI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE='B' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'

polHOWDEOprtdBoat.dbName: (SELECT WI.MAKE + ' ' + WI.MODEL + '(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),WI.YEAR) + ')' FROM POL_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI WHERE WI.CUSTOMER_ID=WDE.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.POLICY_ID=WDE.POLICY_ID AND WI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=WDE.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=WDE.VEHICLE_ID)

polHomeWIDEMvrInformation.Where: WMR.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WMR.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND WMR.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND WMR.DRIVER_ID=@driverId AND WMR.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

polHOWMRVioType.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=WMR.VIOLATION_TYPE)

polHOWMRViolation.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=WMR.VIOLATION_ID)

polHOWMRDeath.dbName: CASE WMR.MVR_DEATH WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

polHOWMROrdered.dbName: CASE WMR.VERIFIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHomeWITrailers.Table: POL_WATERCRAFT_TRAILER_INFO WTI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WTI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WTI.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND WTI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND WTI.TRAILER_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE='T' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
polHomeWITrailers.Where: WTI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WTI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND WTI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND WTI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WTI.TRAILER_NO

polHOWTITrailerTyp.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WTI.TRAILER_TYPE)

polHOWTIBoatNum.dbName: (SELECT WI.MAKE + ' ' + WI.MODEL + '(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),WI.YEAR) + ')' FROM POL_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI WHERE WI.CUSTOMER_ID=WTI.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.POLICY_ID=WTI.POLICY_ID AND WI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=WTI.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=WTI.ASSOCIATED_BOAT)

polHomeWTRIAddlIntDtls.Table: POL_WATERCRAFT_TRAILER_ADD_INT TAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=TAI.HOLDER_ID
polHomeWTRIAddlIntDtls.Where: TAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND TAI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND TAI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND TAI.TRAILER_ID=@trailerId AND TAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

polHOWTAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

polHOWTAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

polHOWTAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

polHOWTAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

polHOWTAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=TAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

polHOWTAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=TAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=TAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

polHOWTAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN TAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN TAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

polHomeWIEquipments.Table: POL_WATERCRAFT_EQUIP_DETAILLS WED LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WED.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WED.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND WED.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND WED.EQUIP_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE='MSE' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
polHomeWIEquipments.Where: WED.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WED.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND WED.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND WED.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY WED.EQUIP_NO

polHOWEDEquipTyp.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WED.EQUIPMENT_TYPE)

polHOWEDDesc.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WED.EQUIP_TYPE)

polHOWEDShipShore.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=WED.SHIP_TO_SHORE)

polHomeSchItemsCvgs.Table: POL_HOME_OWNER_SCH_ITEMS_CVGS SIC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON MC.COV_ID=SIC.ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON SIC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND SIC.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND SIC.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND PS.RISK_ID IN (SELECT TOP 1 DWELLING_ID FROM POL_DWELLINGS_INFO DI WHERE DI.CUSTOMER_ID=SIC.CUSTOMER_ID AND DI.POLICY_ID=SIC.POLICY_ID AND DI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=SIC.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND DI.IS_ACTIVE='Y') AND RISK_TYPE = 'HOME' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polHomeSchItemsCvgs.Where: SIC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND SIC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND SIC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id ORDER BY MC.RANK

polHOSIDeductible.dbName: (SELECT CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE MC.COV_ID=CR.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=CONVERT(INT,DEDUCTIBLE))

polHomeSISchItemDtls.Where: SID.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND SID.POL_ID=@policy_Id AND SID.POL_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND SID.ITEM_ID=@schItemId AND SID.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY SID.ITEM_NUMBER

polHomeRecreationalVeh.Table: POL_HOME_OWNER_RECREATIONAL_VEHICLES RV LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON RV.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND RV.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND RV.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND RV.REC_VEH_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE='RV' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
polHomeRecreationalVeh.Where: RV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND RV.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND RV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND RV.ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY RV.COMPANY_ID_NUMBER

polHORVType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RV.VEHICLE_TYPE)

polHORVPriorLoss.dbName: CASE RV.PRIOR_LOSSES WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHORVPriorLoss.DisplayName: Have there been any prior losses either with the vehicles or any other Recreational vehicle?

polHORVRegOthState.dbName: CASE RV.IS_UNIT_REG_IN_OTHER_STATE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHORVRegOthState.DisplayName: Is any unit registered in a state other than Michigan or Indiana?

polHORVRiskDecl.dbName: CASE RV.RISK_DECL_BY_OTHER_COMP WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHORVRiskDecl.DisplayName: Has this risk been cancelled, declined or non-renewed by another company?

polHORVRaceSpeed.dbName: CASE RV.USED_IN_RACE_SPEED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHORVRaceSpeed.DisplayName: Used to participate in any race or speed contest?

polHORVModified.dbName: CASE RV.VEHICLE_MODIFIED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polHORVExplain.DisplayName: If yes to any questions, please explain

polHomeRVAddlIntDtls.Table: POL_HOMEOWNER_REC_VEH_ADD_INT RAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=RAI.HOLDER_ID
polHomeRVAddlIntDtls.Where: RAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND RAI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND RAI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND RAI.REC_VEH_ID=@recVehId AND RAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

polHORVAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN RAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

polHORVAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN RAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

polHORVAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN RAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

polHORVAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN RAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

polHORVAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=RAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

polHORVAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=RAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=RAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

polHORVAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN RAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN RAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

polHomeSolidFuel.Where: SF.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND SF.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND SF.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND SF.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

polHOSFFuel.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.FUEL)

polHOSFStove.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.STOVE_TYPE)

polHOSFLabLabel.dbName: CASE SF.HAVE_LABORATORY_LABEL WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSFLabLabel.DisplayName: Does the unit have a testing laboratory label (UL, other)

polHOSFIsUnit.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.IS_UNIT)

polHOSFLocation.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.LOCATION)

polHOSFConst.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.CONSTRUCTION)

polHOSFInspectDesc.DisplayName: Installation was Inspected By Other Description

polHOSFProfInstal.dbName: CASE SF.WAS_PROF_INSTALL_DONE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSFProfInstal.DisplayName: Was installation done by a professional installer such as a contractor?

polHOSFHeatUse.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.HEATING_USE)

polHOSFHeatSource.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SF.HEATING_SOURCE)
polHOSFHeatSource.DisplayName: What other type of heating source is used?

polHOSFConform.DisplayName: Does the stove installation and use conform to all of its manufacturers specifications and local fire codes?

polHomeSFFireProtClean.Where: SPC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND SPC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND SPC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND SPC.FUEL_ID=>@fuelId

polHOSPCSmkDetec.dbName: CASE SPC.IS_SMOKE_DETECTOR WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSPCSmkDetec.DisplayName: Is there a smoke detector in the dwelling?

polHOSPCMatFlor.dbName: CASE SPC.IS_PROTECTIVE_MAT_FLOOR WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSPCMatFlor.DisplayName: Is there protective material on the floorMat Floor?

polHOSPCMatWall.dbName: CASE SPC.IS_PROTECTIVE_MAT_WALLS WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSPCMatWall.DisplayName: Is there protective material on the walls?

polHOSPCDescMat.DisplayName: If yes, please describe protective material and indicate whether it is spaced and if so how far?

polHOSPCStvInspct.DisplayName: How often is the stove chimney and stove/smoke pipe cleaned and inspected?

polHomeSFChimneyStove.Where: SCS.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND SCS.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND SCS.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND SCS.FUEL_ID=>@fuelId

polHOSCSStvVent.dbName: CASE SCS.IS_STOVE_VENTED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSCSStvVent.DisplayName: Is the stove vented into the same chimney flue (double vented) with a heating device using a different type of fuel?

polHOSCSOthDevice.DisplayName: If yes, list other devices and where each is attached to the chimney

polHOSCSTileFuel.dbName: CASE SCS.IS_TILE_FLUE_LINING WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSCSTileFuel.DisplayName: If masonry: does tile fuel lining extend from below the stovepipe entry point to the top of the chimney?

polHOSCSGroundUp.dbName: CASE SCS.IS_CHIMNEY_GROUND_UP WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSCSGroundUp.DisplayName: If masonry: is the chimney built from the ground up?

polHOSCSInstHousBlt.dbName: CASE SCS.CHIMNEY_INST_AFTER_HOUSE_BLT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSCSInstHousBlt.DisplayName: Was the chimney installed after the house was built and for this solid fuel heating device?

polHOSCSHdnCombust.dbName: CASE SCS.IS_CHIMNEY_COVERED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSCSHdnCombust.DisplayName: Is chimney covered with or hidden behind a combustible wall?

polHOSCSDistPipe.DisplayName: Give distance from smoke pipe to edges of opening in that wall or cover

polHOSCSDescThimbMat.DisplayName: Describe any thimble or material placed to protect the edges of that opening

polHOSCSStvPipeIs.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SCS.STOVE_PIPE_IS)

polHOSCSSnugly.dbName: CASE SCS.DOES_SMOKE_PIPE_FIT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSCSSnugly.DisplayName: Does the smoke pipe fit snugly into the chimney opening?

polHOSCSWasteHeat.dbName: CASE SCS.SMOKE_PIPE_WASTE_HEAT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSCSWasteHeat.DisplayName: Does the smoke pipe have a waste heat collector/circulator, heat reclaimer, catalytic converter, heat extracto or circulating fan?

polHOSCSSecureCon.dbName: CASE SCS.STOVE_CONN_SECURE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSCSSecureCon.DisplayName: Are stovepipe connections securely fastened to each other with screws at each connection?

polHOSCSPipPasComb.dbName: CASE SCS.SMOKE_PIPE_PASS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polHOSCSPipPasComb.DisplayName: Does the smoke pipe pass through any interior combustible wall, ceiling, closet or concealed are?

polHOSCSThimble.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=SCS.SELECT_PASS)

polMCAGISolOwn.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_NON_OWNED_VEH WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polMCAGIExistDmg.dbName: CASE AGI.EXISTING_DMG WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIExistDmg.DisplayName: Any existing damage to a cycle?

polMCAGIInsuComp.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_OTH_INSU_COMP WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIInsuComp.DisplayName: Any other insurance with this company?

polMCAGILicSusp.dbName: CASE AGI.DRIVER_SUS_REVOKED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGILicSusp.DisplayName: Any drivers license been suspended, revoked Or restricted in last 5 years?

polMCAGIPhyImpird.dbName: CASE AGI.PHY_MENTL_CHALLENGED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIPhyImpird.DisplayName: Any driver physically or mentally impaired?

polMCAGIFinRespFil.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_FINANCIAL_RESPONSIBILITY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polMCAGIDateFil.DisplayName: Driver Number And Date of Filing

polMCAGIInsuTrfr.dbName: CASE AGI.INS_AGENCY_TRANSFER WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIInsuTrfr.DisplayName: Has insurance been transferred within the agency?

polMCAGICovDecl.dbName: CASE AGI.COVERAGE_DECLINED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGICovDecl.DisplayName: Has any coverage been declined, cancelled or non-renewed during the last 3 years?

polMCAGIAgentInsp.dbName: CASE AGI.AGENCY_VEH_INSPECTED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIAgentInsp.DisplayName: Has the agent inspected the cycle?

polMCAGISlvgTitle.dbName: CASE AGI.SALVAGE_TITLE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polMCAGICommUse.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_COMMERCIAL_USE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGICommUse.DisplayName: Any commercial, business, or parade use?

polMCAGICyclRace.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_USEDFOR_RACING WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGICyclRace.DisplayName: Any cycle used for racing, hill climbing, motocross or any sporting event?

polMCAGICostOver.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_COST_OVER_DEFINED_LIMIT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGICostOver.DisplayName: Any cycle have cost new or value over $40,000?

polMCAGIMoreWheel.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_MORE_WHEELS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIMoreWheel.DisplayName: Does cycle have more than 2 wheels and/or a side car?

polMCAGIExtdFork.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_EXTENDED_FORKS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIExtdFork.DisplayName: Any cycle with extended forks over 6 inches?

polMCAGINotLicRoad.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_LICENSED_FOR_ROAD WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGINotLicRoad.DisplayName: Is any cycle not licensed for road use?

polMCAGIModiIncrSpeed.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_MODIFIED_INCREASE_SPEED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIModiIncrSpeed.DisplayName: Any cycle modified to increase speed?

polMCAGIModiFrame.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_MODIFIED_KIT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIModiFrame.DisplayName: Any cycle on modified frame, a kit or assembled bike?

polMCAGICarelessDriv.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_CONVICTED_CARELESS_DRIVE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGICarelessDriv.DisplayName: In the last 5 years - have you been convicted of reckless or careless driving, DUIL, DWI?

polMCAGIAccidentDrug.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_CONVICTED_ACCIDENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIAccidentDrug.DisplayName: In the last 5 years - have you been convicted of leaving scene of accident or drug use?

polMCAGIMultiPolicy.dbName: CASE AGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polMCAGIOwnRent.DisplayName: Current Residence is Owned or Rented?

polMCAGILivHouseHold.dbName: CASE AGI.IS_OTHER_THAN_INSURED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGILivHouseHold.DisplayName: Anyone other than insured listed, living in household?

polMCAGIWhichCycl.dbName: CASE AGI.WHICHCYCLE WHEN 0 THEN 'None' ELSE (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),INSURED_VEH_NUMBER) + ' - ' + MAKE FROM POL_VEHICLES AV WHERE AV.CUSTOMER_ID=AGI.CUSTOMER_ID AND AV.POLICY_ID=AGI.POLICY_ID AND AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=AGI.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AV.VEHICLE_ID=AGI.WHICHCYCLE) END

polMCAGIPriorLoss.dbName: CASE AGI.ANY_PRIOR_LOSSES WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polMCAGIPersUmbPol.dbName: CASE AGI.APPLY_PERS_UMB_POL WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCAGIPersUmbPol.DisplayName: Does the insured have or applying for a Personal Umbrella Policy?

polCyclMCycleInfo.Table: POL_VEHICLES AV LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AV.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AV.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AV.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
polCyclMCycleInfo.Where: AV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AV.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AV.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY AV.INSURED_VEH_NUMBER

polMCPolLvlCvgs.Table: POL_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='PL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AVC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polMCPolLvlCvgs.Where: AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY MC.RANK

polMCAVCPLLimit.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NOT NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') + ' ' + CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1 IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT) + '/' + REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1),1),'.00','') END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.COV_ID=MC.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=AVC.LIMIT_ID) END

polMCAVCPLSigObt.dbName: CASE ISNULL(MC.ISADDDEDUCTIBLE_APP,0) WHEN 0 THEN 'N.A.' ELSE CASE AVC.SIGNATURE_OBTAINED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END END

polMCVehLvlCvgs.Table: POL_VEHICLE_COVERAGES AVC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON AVC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='RL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON AVC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND AVC.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=PS.RISK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polMCVehLvlCvgs.Where: AVC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AVC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AVC.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY MC.RANK

polMCAVCVLLimit.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_ID IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN AVC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.LIMIT_1),1),'.00','') END ELSE (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1 IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT) + '/' + REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT1),1),'.00','') END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.COV_ID=MC.COV_ID AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID=AVC.LIMIT_ID) END

polMCAVCVLDed.dbName: CASE WHEN AVC.DEDUC_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT CASE WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NULL THEN REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') WHEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT IS NULL AND CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NOT NULL THEN CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT),1),'.00','') + ' ' + CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_AMOUNT_TEXT END FROM MNT_COVERAGE_RANGES CR WHERE CR.LIMIT_DEDUC_ID = AVC.DEDUC_ID) ELSE REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),CONVERT(MONEY,AVC.DEDUCTIBLE_1),1),'.00','') END

polMCAVCVLSigObt.dbName: CASE ISNULL(MC.ISADDDEDUCTIBLE_APP,0) WHEN 0 THEN 'N.A.' ELSE CASE AVC.SIGNATURE_OBTAINED WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END END

polCyclEndorsements.Table: POL_VEHICLE_ENDORSEMENTS AVE INNER JOIN MNT_ENDORSMENT_DETAILS ED ON AVE.ENDORSEMENT_ID=ED.ENDORSMENT_ID
polCyclEndorsements.Where: AVE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AVE.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AVE.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AVE.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId ORDER BY ED.RANK

polCyclAddlIntDtls.Table: POL_ADD_OTHER_INT HAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=HAI.HOLDER_ID
polCyclAddlIntDtls.Where: HAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND HAI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND HAI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND HAI.VEHICLE_ID=@vehicleId AND HAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

polMCHAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

polMCHAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

polMCHAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

polMCHAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

polMCHAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

polMCHAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

polMCHAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

polCyclDriverInfo.Where: ADE.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND ADE.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND ADE.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND ADE.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY ADE.DRIVER_FNAME,ADE.DRIVER_MNAME,ADE.DRIVER_LNAME

polMCADEGender.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_SEX WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END

polMCADEMartSta.dbName: (SELECT LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES A INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES B ON A.LOOKUP_ID=B.LOOKUP_ID AND LOOKUP_NAME = 'MARST' WHERE LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE = ADE.DRIVER_MART_STAT)

polMCADEUSCitzn.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_US_CITIZEN WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polMCADEDrugVio.dbName: CASE ADE.DRIVER_DRINK_VIOLATION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polMCADEDrugVio.DisplayName: Drinking or Drug Related violation in last 5 years?

polMCADECyclEndo.dbName: CASE ADE.NO_CYCLE_ENDMT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polMCADEDriveCycl.dbName: (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,INSURED_VEH_NUMBER)+' '+VEHICLE_YEAR+' '+MAKE FROM POL_VEHICLES AV WHERE AV.CUSTOMER_ID=ADE.CUSTOMER_ID AND AV.POLICY_ID=ADE.POLICY_ID AND AV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=ADE.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND AV.VEHICLE_ID=ADE.VEHICLE_ID)

polCyclADEMvrInformation.Where: AMR.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND AMR.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND AMR.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND AMR.DRIVER_ID=@driverId AND AMR.IS_ACTIVE='Y'

polMCAMRVioType.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=AMR.VIOLATION_TYPE)

polMCAMRViolation.dbName: (SELECT MV.VIOLATION_DES FROM MNT_VIOLATIONS MV WHERE MV.VIOLATION_ID=AMR.VIOLATION_ID)

polMCAMRDeath.dbName: CASE AMR.MVR_DEATH WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END

polMCAMROrdered.dbName: CASE AMR.VERIFIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIIsVacant.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_VACENT_OCCUPY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIIsVacant.DisplayName: Is dwelling currently Vacant or Unoccupied?

polRDGIIsDwelRent.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_RENTED_IN_PART WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIIsDwelRent.DisplayName: Is dwelling rented in whole or part to students under age 30?

polRDGIIsDwellOwned.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_DWELLING_OWNED_BY_OTHER WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIIsDwellOwned.DisplayName: Is dwelling owned by anyone other than an individual?

polRDGIBusiConduct.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_FARMING_BUSINESS_COND WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIDayCare.dbName: CASE RDGI.PROVIDE_HOME_DAY_CARE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIDayCare.DisplayName: Provide Home Day Care for Monetary or other compensation?

polRDGIModular.dbName: CASE RDGI.MODULAR_MANUFACTURED_HOME WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIFoundation.dbName: CASE RDGI.BUILT_ON_CONTINUOUS_FOUNDATION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIFoundation.DisplayName: Is it Built on a continuous foundation ?

polRDGILocaCommercial.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_PROP_NEXT_COMMERICAL WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGILocaCommercial.DisplayName: Is property located next to a commercial building?

polRDGIStairways.dbName: CASE RDGI.ARE_STAIRWAYS_PRESENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIAnyPet.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANIMALS_EXO_PETS_HISTORY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIAnyHotTub.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_SWIMPOLL_HOTTUB WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIAnyHotTub.DisplayName: Is there an enclosed swimming pool or hot tub (not including bathroom type Jacuzzi or hot tub)?

polRDGIHotTubDesc.DisplayName: Enclosed swimming pool or hot tub description

polRDGIValuedCustomer.dbName: CASE RDGI.VALUED_CUSTOMER_DISCOUNT_OVERRIDE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIInsuTrnsfrAgency.dbName: CASE RDGI.HAS_INSU_TRANSFERED_AGENCY WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIInsuTrnsfrAgency.DisplayName: Has insurance been transferred within the agency?

polRDGIOwnerChanged.dbName: CASE RDGI.IS_OWNERS_DWELLING_CHANGED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIOwnerChanged.DisplayName: Has ownership of this dwelling changed more than one time in the last 3 years?

polRDGIAnyCovDecline.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_COV_DECLINED_CANCELED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIAnyCovDecline.DisplayName: Any coverage declined, cancelled or non-renewed during the last 3 years?

polRDGIConvictArson.dbName: CASE RDGI.CONVICTION_DEGREE_IN_PAST WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIConvictArson.DisplayName: Conviction of any degree of arson in last 3 years?

polRDGILeadPaint.dbName: CASE RDGI.LEAD_PAINT_HAZARD WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIMultiPolicy.dbName: CASE RDGI.MULTI_POLICY_DISC_APPLIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIResiEmployee.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_RESIDENCE_EMPLOYEE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIResiOwned.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_OTHER_RESI_OWNED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIResiOwned.DisplayName: Any other residence owned, occupied or rented?

polRDGIOtherInsurance.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_OTH_INSU_COMP WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIOtherInsurance.DisplayName: Any other insurance with this company?

polRDGIRenovation.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_RENOVATION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIDescRenovate.DisplayName: Est. completion date and value, if undergoing renovation

polRDGITrampoline.dbName: CASE RDGI.TRAMPOLINE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIRoomers.dbName: CASE RDGI.RENTERS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIHeatSource.dbName: CASE RDGI.ANY_HEATING_SOURCE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIHeatSource.DisplayName: Any supplemental heating source(wood stove,fireplace inserts,etc.)?

polRDGIBuildUndConst.dbName: CASE RDGI.BUILD_UNDER_CON_GEN_CONT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIBuildUndConst.DisplayName: If Building is Under Construction, is the Applicant the General Contractor?

polRDGISwimPool.dbName: CASE RDGI.SWIMMING_POOL WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGISwimPoolType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV INNER JOIN MNT_LOOKUP_TABLES MLT ON MLV.LOOKUP_ID=MLT.LOOKUP_ID AND MLT.LOOKUP_NAME = 'SPLCD' AND MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE=CONVERT(VARCHAR,RDGI.SWIMMING_POOL_TYPE))

polRDGIApprovFence.dbName: CASE RDGI.APPROVED_FENCE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIDivinBoard.dbName: CASE RDGI.DIVING_BOARD WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGISlide.dbName: CASE RDGI.SLIDE WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDGIMoreAcre.dbName: CASE RDGI.PROPERTY_ON_MORE_THAN WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIMoreAcre.DisplayName: Is Property situated on more than 5 Acres?

polRDGIMobileHome.dbName: CASE RDGI.DWELLING_MOBILE_HOME WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIMobileHome.DisplayName: Is the dwelling a mobile home or double wide?

polRDGIUseWholePart.dbName: CASE RDGI.PROPERTY_USED_WHOLE_PART WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDGIUseWholePart.DisplayName: Is Property Used in whole or in part for farming, commercial, industrial, professional or business purposes except if use is incidental?

polRentLocDtls.Where: PL.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND PL.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND PL.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND PL.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY PL.LOC_NUM

polRDLocIsPrim.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=PL.LOCATION_TYPE)

polRDLocWeekBasis.dbName: CASE PL.RENTED_WEEKLY WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDLocWeekBasis.DisplayName: Is location rented on a Weekly Basis?

polRDLocCountry.dbName: (SELECT MCL.COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST MCL WHERE MCL.COUNTRY_ID=PL.LOC_COUNTRY)

polRDLocState.dbName: (SELECT CSL.STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST CSL WHERE CSL.COUNTRY_ID=PL.LOC_COUNTRY AND CSL.STATE_ID=PL.LOC_STATE)

polRentDwellInfo.Table: POL_DWELLINGS_INFO DI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DI.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND DI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND DI.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE='RENTAL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
polRentDwellInfo.Where: DI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND DI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND DI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY DI.DWELLING_NUMBER

polRDDILocation.dbName: (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR,AL.LOC_NUM) + '- ' + AL.LOC_ADD1 + ' ' + AL.LOC_ADD2 + ', ' + AL.LOC_CITY + ', ' + SL.STATE_NAME + ', '+ AL.LOC_ZIP FROM POL_LOCATIONS AL INNER JOIN MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST SL ON SL.COUNTRY_ID=AL.LOC_COUNTRY AND SL.STATE_ID=AL.LOC_STATE WHERE AL.CUSTOMER_ID=DI.CUSTOMER_ID AND AL.POLICY_ID=DI.POLICY_ID AND AL.POLICY_VERSION_ID=DI.POLICY_VERSION_ID)

polRDDIBuildType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=DI.BUILDING_TYPE)

polRDDIOccupancy.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=DI.OCCUPANCY)

polRDDINeighbors.dbName: CASE DI.NEIGHBOURS_VISIBLE WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDDIOccupied.dbName: CASE DI.OCCUPIED_DAILY WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRentDWOthStruDtls.Where: OS.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND OS.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND OS.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND OS.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId AND OS.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY OS.OTHER_STRUCTURE_ID

polRDOSPicAttach.dbName: CASE OS.PICTURE_ATTACHED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDOSCovBasis.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=OS.COVERAGE_BASIS)

polRDOSAmtDesire.DisplayName: Additional Amount of Insurance Desired (Coverage B)

polRDOSSatelitEq.dbName: CASE OS.SATELLITE_EQUIPMENT WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRentDWRatingInfo.Where: RI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND RI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND RI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND RI.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId

polRDRIProtClas.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.PROT_CLASS)

polRDRIDwelUndConst.dbName: CASE RI.IS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polRDRIWolAutoPol.dbName: CASE RI.IS_AUTO_POL_WITH_CARRIER WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polRDRIWolAutoPol.DisplayName: Does Wolverine Mutual write your Auto policy?

polRDRICircuitBreak.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.CIRCUIT_BREAKERS)

polRDRIFoundation.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.FOUNDATION)

polRDRIRoofType.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.ROOF_TYPE)

polRDRIRoofDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN RI.ROOF_OTHER_DESC IS NULL OR RI.ROOF_OTHER_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A' ELSE RI.ROOF_OTHER_DESC END

polRDRIPrimHeatDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN RI.PRIMARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC IS NULL OR RI.PRIMARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A' ELSE RI.PRIMARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC END

polRDRISecondHeatDesc.dbName: CASE WHEN RI.SECONDARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC IS NULL OR RI.SECONDARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC = '' THEN 'N.A' ELSE RI.SECONDARY_HEAT_OTHER_DESC END

polRDRISprinker.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID=RI.SPRINKER)

polRDRINumLocAlrm.DisplayName: Number of local alarms applies to smoke or gas alarms

polRentDWAddlIntDtls.Table: POL_HOME_OWNER_ADD_INT HAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=HAI.HOLDER_ID
polRentDWAddlIntDtls.Where: HAI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND HAI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND HAI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND HAI.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId AND HAI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY HIL.HOLDER_NAME

polRDHAIHolderName.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_NAME ELSE HIL.HOLDER_NAME END

polRDHAIAdd1.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD1 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD1 END

polRDHAIAdd2.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ADD2 ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ADD2 END

polRDHAICity.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_CITY ELSE HIL.HOLDER_CITY END

polRDHAICountry.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY) ELSE (SELECT COUNTRY_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY) END

polRDHAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

polRDHAIZip.dbName: CASE WHEN HAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN HAI.HOLDER_ZIP ELSE HIL.HOLDER_ZIP END

polRentDWCovSec1Dtls.Table: POL_DWELLING_SECTION_COVERAGES DSC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON DSC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='S1' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DSC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DSC.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND DSC.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'RENTAL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polRentDWCovSec1Dtls.Where: DSC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DSC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND DSC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY MC.RANK

polRDCS1Included.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.LIMIT_1) END

polRDCS1Deductible.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.DEDUCTIBLE IS NULL THEN 'All Peril Deductible' ELSE CASE WHEN DSC.DEDUCTIBLE_TEXT IS NULL OR DSC.DEDUCTIBLE_TEXT = '' THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE) ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE) + DSC.DEDUCTIBLE_TEXT END END

polRentDWCovSec2Dtls.Table: POL_DWELLING_SECTION_COVERAGES DSC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON DSC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID=MC.COV_ID AND MC.COVERAGE_TYPE='S2' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON DSC.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND DSC.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND DSC.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'RENTAL' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polRentDWCovSec2Dtls.Where: DSC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND DSC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND DSC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND DSC.DWELLING_ID=@dwellingId ORDER BY MC.RANK

polRDCS2Included.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT_1 IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT1_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NULL THEN 'Included' ELSE DSC.LIMIT1_AMOUNT_TEXT END ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.LIMIT_1) END

polRDCS2Additional.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.LIMIT1_AMOUNT_TEXT IS NOT NULL THEN 'No Coverage' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE_1) END

polRDCS2Deductible.dbName: CASE WHEN DSC.DEDUCTIBLE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),DSC.DEDUCTIBLE) END

polRentDWEndorsements.Table: POL_DWELLING_ENDORSEMENTS DE INNER JOIN MNT_ENDORSMENT_DETAILS ED ON DE.ENDORSEMENT_ID=ED.ENDORSMENT_ID

polBoatWcraftDtls.Table: POL_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND WI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE='B' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = 'SUMTOTAL'
polBoatWcraftDtls.Where: WI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND WI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND WI.IS_ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY BOAT_NO

polBoatWICovLimitInfo.Table: POL_WATERCRAFT_COVERAGE_INFO WCI INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON MC.COV_ID=WCI.COVERAGE_CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT PS ON WCI.CUSTOMER_ID = PS.CUSTOMER_ID AND WCI.POLICY_ID = PS.POLICY_ID AND WCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID = PS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND WCI.BOAT_ID=PS.RISK_ID AND RISK_TYPE = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN CLT_PREMIUM_SPLIT_DETAILS PSD ON PS.UNIQUE_ID=PSD.SPLIT_UNIQUE_ID AND PSD.COMPONENT_CODE = MC.COMPONENT_CODE
polBoatWICovLimitInfo.Where: WCI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND WCI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND WCI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND WCI.BOAT_ID=@boatId ORDER BY MC.RANK

polBoatWIAddlIntDtls.Table: POL_WATERCRAFT_COV_ADD_INT WAI LEFT OUTER JOIN MNT_HOLDER_INTEREST_LIST HIL ON HIL.HOLDER_ID=WAI.HOLDER_ID

polWCAIState.dbName: CASE WHEN WAI.HOLDER_ID IS NULL THEN (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=WAI.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=WAI.HOLDER_STATE) ELSE (SELECT STATE_NAME FROM MNT_COUNTRY_STATE_LIST WHERE COUNTRY_ID=HIL.HOLDER_COUNTRY AND STATE_ID=HIL.HOLDER_STATE) END

polWCTIBoatNum.dbName: (SELECT WI.MAKE + ' ' + WI.MODEL + '(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),WI.YEAR) + ')' FROM POL_WATERCRAFT_INFO WI WHERE WI.CUSTOMER_ID=WTI.CUSTOMER_ID AND WI.POLICY_ID=WTI.POLICY_ID AND WI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=WTI.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND WI.BOAT_ID=WTI.ASSOCIATED_BOAT)

polUMBSchUnderly.Table: POL_UMBRELLA_UNDERLYING_POLICIES UUP INNER JOIN MNT_LOB_MASTER LM ON LOB_ID=UUP.POLICY_LOB
polUMBSchUnderly.Where: UUP.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND UUP.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND UUP.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id ORDER BY UUP.POLICY_NUMBER

polUMBSchUnderlyCvgs.Where: UUPC.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND UUPC.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND UUPC.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND UUPC.POLICY_NUMBER='@policy_number'

polUMBUCExcessCoverages.Table: POL_UMBRELLA_COVERAGES UC INNER JOIN MNT_COVERAGE MC ON MC.COV_ID=UC.COVERAGE_CODE_ID

polUMBLocations.Where: REL.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND REL.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND REL.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND REL.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY REL.LOCATION_NUMBER

polUMBRELCoverHO82.DisplayName: Do you carry Personal Injury Coverage - HO-82?

polUMBRELLocExclude.DisplayName: Is location exluded under this policy?

polUMBAutomobile.Where: UVI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND UVI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND UVI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND UVI.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'

polUMBRecrationalVeh.Where: URV.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND URV.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND URV.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND URV.ACTIVE='Y' ORDER BY URV.COMPANY_ID_NUMBER

polUMBURVVehLicRoad.dbName: CASE URV.VEH_LIC_ROAD WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polUMBURVVehLicRoad.DisplayName: Is this vehicle licensed for the Road?

polUMBURVVehModified.dbName: CASE URV.VEHICLE_MODIFIED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polUMBURVRaceSpeed.dbName: CASE URV.USED_IN_RACE_SPEED WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END
polUMBURVRaceSpeed.DisplayName: Used to participate in any race or speed contest?

polUMBWatercraft.Where: UWI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND UWI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND UWI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND UWI.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY UWI.BOAT_NO

polUMBUWIRaceSpeed.DisplayName: Watercraft Used to participate in any race, speed or fishing contest ?

polUMBDrivers.Where: UDD.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND UDD.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND UDD.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND UDD.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY UDD.DRIVER_FNAME

polUMBUDDMartStatus.dbName: (SELECT LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES WHERE LOOKUP_ID=721 AND LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE = UDD.DRIVER_MART_STAT)

polUMBUDDGender.dbName: (SELECT LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES WHERE LOOKUP_ID=846 AND LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE = UDD.DRIVER_SEX)

polUMBUDDDriverType.dbName: (SELECT LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES WHERE LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID = UDD.DRIVER_DRIV_TYPE)

polUMBUDDF95.dbName: CASE UDD.FORM_F95 WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polUMBUDDVehicle.dbName: (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(5),UVI.VEHICLE_ID) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(5),UVI.VEHICLE_YEAR) + ' ' + UVI.MAKE FROM POL_UMBRELLA_VEHICLE_INFO UVI WHERE UVI.CUSTOMER_ID=UDD.CUSTOMER_ID AND UVI.POLICY_ID=UDD.POLICY_ID AND UVI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=UDD.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND UVI.VEHICLE_ID=UDD.VEHICLE_ID)

polUMBUDDVehicleDriveAS.dbName: (SELECT LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES WHERE LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID = UDD.APP_VEHICLE_PRIN_OCC_ID)

polUMBUDDMCycl.dbName: (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(5),UVI.VEHICLE_ID) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(5),UVI.VEHICLE_YEAR) + ' ' + UVI.MAKE FROM POL_UMBRELLA_VEHICLE_INFO UVI WHERE UVI.CUSTOMER_ID=UDD.CUSTOMER_ID AND UVI.POLICY_ID=UDD.POLICY_ID AND UVI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=UDD.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND UVI.VEHICLE_ID=UDD.MOT_VEHICLE_ID)

polUMBUDDMCyclDriveAs.dbName: (SELECT LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES WHERE LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID = UDD.MOT_APP_VEHICLE_PRIN_OCC_ID)

polUMBUDDBoat.dbName: (SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(5),UVI.BOAT_NO) + ' ' + UVI.MAKE + ' ' + UVI.MODEL + ' (' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(5),UVI.YEAR) + ')' FROM POL_UMBRELLA_WATERCRAFT_INFO UVI WHERE UVI.CUSTOMER_ID=UDD.CUSTOMER_ID AND UVI.POLICY_ID=UDD.POLICY_ID AND UVI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=UDD.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND UVI.BOAT_ID=UDD.OP_VEHICLE_ID)

polUMBUDDBoatDriveAS.dbName: (SELECT LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES WHERE LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID = UDD.OP_APP_VEHICLE_PRIN_OCC_ID)

polUMBFarmDetails.Where: UFI.CUSTOMER_ID=@cutomerId AND UFI.POLICY_ID=@policy_Id AND UFI.POLICY_VERSION_ID=@policy_Version_Id AND UFI.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY UFI.LOCATION_NUMBER

polUMBUFIFullPartTime.dbName: CASE UFI.EMP_FULL_PART WHEN 'P' THEN 'Full Time' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Part Time' ELSE '' END

polUMBUFIOccupied.dbName: CASE UFI.OCCUPIED_BY_APPLICANT WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

polUMBUFIRented.dbName: CASE UFI.RENTED_TO_OTHER WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN 'N' THEN 'No' ELSE '' END

clClaimInfo.Table: CLM_CLAIM_INFO CLM INNER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL ON POL.POLICY_ID = CLM.POLICY_ID AND POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID = CLM.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND POL.CUSTOMER_ID = CLM.CUSTOMER_ID INNER JOIN CLM_ADJUSTER ADJ ON ADJ.ADJUSTER_ID = CLM.ADJUSTER_ID

cplClmAgency.dbName: (SELECT AGENCY_DISPLAY_NAME FROM MNT_AGENCY_LIST MNT WHERE MNT.AGENCY_ID = POL.AGENCY_ID)

cplClmPartyDetails.Table: CLM_PARTIES CP INNER JOIN CLM_TYPE_DETAIL CTD ON CTD.DETAIL_TYPE_ID = CP.PARTY_TYPE_ID

cplClmPartyW9Form.dbName: (SELECT MLV.LOOKUP_VALUE_DESC FROM MNT_LOOKUP_VALUES MLV WHERE MLV.LOOKUP_UNIQUE_ID = CP.W9_FORM)

gcpayeeDetails.Table: ACT_CHECK_INFORMATION ACT INNER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL ON POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID = ACT.POLICY_VER_TRACKING_ID AND POL.CUSTOMER_ID = ACT.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_ID = ACT.POLICY_ID

ccpayeeDetails.Table: ACT_CHECK_INFORMATION ACT INNER JOIN ACT_ACCOUNTS_POSTING_DETAILS ACCOUNTS ON ACT.CUSTOMER_ID = ACCOUNTS.CUSTOMER_ID AND ACT.POLICY_ID = ACCOUNTS.POLICY_ID AND ACT.POLICY_VER_TRACKING_ID = ACCOUNTS.POLICY_VERSION_ID AND ACT.CHECK_ID = ACCOUNTS.SOURCE_ROW_ID AND ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_ID = ACT.CLM_SUSPENCE_ACCT INNER JOIN POL_CUSTOMER_POLICY_LIST POL ON POL.POLICY_VERSION_ID = ACT.POLICY_VER_TRACKING_ID AND POL.CUSTOMER_ID = ACT.CUSTOMER_ID AND POL.POLICY_ID = ACT.POLICY_ID
